[\[60b.3\]]byas pa de'i rkyen gyis tshe 'dir yang bsad pa dang /_bcing ba la sogs pa gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur la/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang ngan song gsum la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bas bdag la gnod do/_/sems can bcom pas gzhan la gnod par ston te/_tshul
[\[60b.4\]]khrims 'khrugs par gyur na ni sdig pa'i las la 'dzem pa med par 'jug ste/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang /_nor las ma byin par len pas na gzhan la gnod do/_/de ltar bdag la yang sdug bsngal bskyed/_gzhan la yang sdug bsngal bskyed pas na/_gnyi ga la gnod
[\[60b.5\]]do/_/'gyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa tshig rnam pa drug gis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_'gyod pa dang bcas pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bral ba dang /_bsrung ba dang bral ba dang /_ston pas smad pa dang /_rtsod pa'i gzhir bcas pa dang /_grags ldan med pa dang drug gis tshe 'di
[\[60b.6\]]la kha na ma tho ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba ston te/_ji ltar 'phel bar 'gyur zhe na/_de'i phyir ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_de bdag dang pha rol rnams lha dang ston pa yang slu 'phya bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_'gyod pa dang bcas pas ni bdag gis bdag bslus pa dang /_bdag
[\[60b.7\]]la bdag smod par byed pa ston te/_ji lta zhe na/_sdig pa mi dge ba byas pa'i gang zag de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_bsod nams byed pa'i gang zag dag ni thar pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin la/_'phags bdag ni 'jigs pa med pa yin no/_/sdig pa byed pa dag ni ngan song gi
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]lam du zhugs pa yin la/_sdig pa byed pa'i gang zag dag ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin te/_bdag gis kyang sdig pa byas pa yin pas/_ngan song gi lam du zhugs pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag ni brlag pa'o chud zos pa'o zhes bdag nyid
[\[61a.2\]]kyis bdag nyid kyi lus dang sems la smod par byed do/_/rnyed pa dang bral ba zhes bya bas/_pha rol slu zhing pha rol gyis smod par byed pa bstan te/_'di ltar sdig pa byed pa'i gang zag de la sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams kyang 'di skad du zer te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni 'di ltar sdig pa
[\[61a.3\]]byed pa mi gtsang ba grong gi tsher ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba 'di la chos gos dang bsod snyoms la sogs pa sbyin pa'i gnas kyang ma yin no zhes zer zhing /_bsod snyoms la sogs pa yang mi ster la/_mthong na yang kha zer zhing smod par byed pas na/_gzhan slu zhing 'phya bar byed pa'o/_/
[\[61a.4\]]srung ba dang bral zhes bya bas/_lha slu zhing lhas smod par byed pa ston te/_'di ltar sngon tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi lha rnams kyis srung bar byed pa de phan chad lha de dag srung bar mi byed la/_gang zag 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa'i chos spyod
[\[61a.5\]]pa'o zhes smod par byed do/_/de bzhin ston pa zhes bya bas ston pa sangs rgyas kyang slu zhing smod par mdzad pa ston to/_/ston pa sangs rgyas kyis kyang gang zag 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa bong bu'i sgra skad can yang dag pa'i rjes su mi 'brang ba ste/_shi ba'i ro dang 'dra'o zhes rnam pa du mar
[\[61a.6\]]smod par mdzad do/_/gzhan yang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shes pa dang /_chos nyid kyis smod par byed do zhes bya ba la/_rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pas gzhan yang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa shes pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyis smod par byed pa ston te/_'di ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
[\[61a.7\]]pa dag kyang gang zag de la/_gang zag de ni 'di ltar sdig par byed pa bslab pa nyams pa ste/_shi ba'i ro dang 'dra'o zhes smod par byed cing /_gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa la sogs pa'i las kyang byed pa'i phyir ro/_/phyogs dang mtshams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_grags pa dang ldan
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]pa med pas phyogs mtshams su de'i sdig pa byed pa'i sgra mi snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba ston te/_bslab pa nyams pa'i gang zag de phyogs kun du yang gang zag che ge mo zhig gis tshul khrims nyams pa/_ngan pa'i ngang tshul can/_sdig pa'i las byed pa'o zhes mi snyan pa kun du grags par 'gyur ro/_/tshe
[\[61b.2\]]rabs gzhan du mi khom par skye bas tshe rabs gzhan du kha na ma tho bar 'byung ba ston te/_tshe phyi mar yang ngan song gsum du skye ba'i phyir ro/_/thob pa dang ma thob pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_sems la sdug bsngal chen po thob pa nyid kyis tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi mar kha na ma tho ba 'byung ba ston te/_
[\[61b.3\]]tshe 'dir tshad med pa bzhi thob pa las nyams pa dang /_tshe 'dir lus dang sems la gdung ba chen po myong bar gyur pa ni tshe 'di'i kha na ma tho ba 'byung ba'o/_/tshe rabs gzhan du tshad med pa bzhi thob pa las mi 'thob par 'gyur ba las tshe rabs gzhan du lus dang sems la gnod par 'byung ba
[\[61b.4\]]'di tshe rabs gzhan du kha na ma tho ba 'byung ba'o/_/de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa rnam pa mang po 'byung ba bstan nas/_da ni yon tan ston te/_yon tan dang ni nyes pa med pa dang /_sems can gyi don du 'khor ba las yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/de bstan pa'i phyir/_nyes pa de
[\[61b.5\]]dag thams cad ni/_/byams pa la sogs gnas mi 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_gong du bshad pa'i nyes pa bdag bcom pa dang /_gzhan bcom pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa de dag_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams la
[\[61b.6\]]mi 'byung ste/_'dis ni nyes pa med pa bstan to/_/nyon mongs med pas sems can don/_/'khor ba 'dor bar mi byed do/_/zhes bya ba la/_shes rab dang ldan pa 'khor ba la gnas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pas mi gos te/_de bas na nyon mongs pa
[\[61b.7\]]med pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni 'khor ba na mi gnas pa bstan to/_/snying rje dang ldan pas sems can gyi don du 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ste/_des ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa bstan te/_dper na tshigs bcad rkang pa gnyis kyis sems can gyi don du 'khor ba
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]yongs su mi gtong ba bstan te/_ji ltar rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/byams la sogs pas sems can la/_/yon tan ldan pa'i bu gcig la/_/sems can kun gyis de ltar min/_/zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa
[\[62a.2\]]la sogs pa rgya cher ston to/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_phan pa dang bde ba mdzad pa ltar pha ma gnyis bdag gis bu gcig pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing mdzangs pa
[\[62a.3\]]dang /_mkhas pa yod pa la yang byams pa dang phangs pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ngo /_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byams pa la sogs pa mdzad pa ltar/_sems can thams cad kyi byams pa dang snying rje la sogs pa gcig tu bsdus kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[62a.4\]]gcig gi byams pa dang /_snying rje tsam mi 'byung ngo /_/snying rje'i dbye ba dang /_de'i dmigs pas brtsams te zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa
[\[62a.5\]]gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes dmigs par bya ba'i yul ni sems can rnam pa bcu ste/_de ltar na snying rje yang phye na rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/rab tu 'bar dang zhes bya ba la/_'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chags pa
[\[62a.6\]]rnams ni/_rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi me rab tu 'bar bas rang dbang med par byas so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje rab tu skye'o/_/dgra dbang song zhes bya ba la/_dge ba la zhugs
[\[62a.7\]]pa rnams bdud kyi dbang du song nas dge ba byed pa btang ste/_bar chad byas pa rnams ni dgra'i dbang du song ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bdud kyi dbang du song bas rang dbang med par byas so zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]po skye'o/_/sdug bsngal gzir dang zhes bya ba la/_sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gsum du skyes pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gzir
[\[62b.2\]]zhing nyam thag go zhes thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/mun pas bsgribs zhes bya ba la/_shan pa dang rngon pa la sogs pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i lam la zhen pa rnams ni de las de'i rkyen gyis ma 'ongs pa na sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye bar ma mthong bas na mun pas
[\[62b.3\]]bsgribs pa zhes bya ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'di dag ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i lam la zhen pas ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/lam ngan par ni zhugs pa dag ces bya ba la/_
[\[62b.4\]]gang zag rigs chad pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can ni lam ngan par zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_rtag tu 'khor ba 'ba' zhig tu skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba 'ba' zhig tu rgyun ma chad par skye'i/_nams kyang
[\[62b.5\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i skal ba med do zhes thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/bcing ba che dang ldan pa rnams/_/zhes bya ba la/_mu stegs pa bdag dang bdag gir rtog pa lta ba sna tshogs kyis thar pa tshol ba rnams ni bcing ba dam pos bcings pa zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems
[\[62b.6\]]dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i bcing ba dam pos bcings so zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/zas mchog dug dang 'dres la zhe na/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ro la chags pa
[\[62b.7\]]rnams ni/_kha zas ngan pa dug dang 'dres pa za ba dang 'dra ste/_dper na kha zas zhim po dug dang 'dres pa za ba'i tshe na bde yang /_zos pa'i 'og tu shi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi ro la chags pa rnams kyang thang cig bde zhing tshim mod kyi/_phyis bde
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ba la chags shing zhen pa'i shugs kyis bsam gtan las nyams shing 'pho bar 'gyur bas na nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni chags pa ma yin pa la mngon par chags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'
[\[63a.2\]]thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/lam ni rab tu stor ba dag_/ces bya ba la/_mu stegs pa brag kha nas mchong ba dang /_mi lnga'i dka' thub byed pa la sogs pa thar pa'i lam ma yin pa la thar pa'i lam du mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa rnams ni lam stor ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems
[\[63a.3\]]dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni lam ma yin pa la lam du nga rgyal byed do zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/lam log zhugs pa zhes bya ba la/_nyan thos kyi rigs ma nges pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ma nges pa nyan thos kyi theg par zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_
[\[63a.4\]]de dag la byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don du zhugs pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam btang nas/_bdag 'ba' zhig thar par 'gyur ba'i lam du zhugs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/nyam chung ba yi zhes bya ba la/_
[\[63a.5\]]mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i zil gyis gnon pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs myur du rdzogs par mi nus pa rnams ni nyam chung ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' e ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams dang ye shes
[\[63a.6\]]kyi tshogs nyid kyi stobs chung ngo zhes byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/snying rje bar bya ba'i dmigs pa'i 'bras bu lnga bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_snying rje'i dmigs pa'i yul bstan nas/_snying rjes sems can la dmigs na 'bras bu ci 'thob par 'gyur ba
[\[63a.7\]]bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste/_'bras bu'ang rnam pa lnga 'thob po/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'tshe spangs zhes bya ba la/_snying rje dang ldan pa rnams ni sems can la brdeg pa dang 'tshog pa la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba mi byed pas 'tshe ba spang zhes bya ste/_'dis ni bral ba'i 'bras bu
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bstan to/_/byang chub mchog gi sa bon dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_snying rje'i dbang gis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dbang gi 'bras bu'o/_/bde thob dka' thub pa dang zhes bya ba la/_snying rje dang ldan pa rnams
[\[63b.2\]]sems can gzhan sdug bsngal las bsgral nas bde ba la 'god par byed pa dang /_sems can gyi don du bdag nyid grang ba dang tsha ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dka' thub sna tshogs nyams su len par byed de/_'dis ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i
[\[63b.3\]]rgyu zhes bya ba la/_snying rje dang ldan pa rnams gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur te/_de ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/rang bzhin gtong ba zhes bya ba la/_snying rje can rnams snying rje la goms par byas pas/_tshe 'dir yang snying rje'i khyad par zhugs pa 'byung ba dang /_tshe
[\[63b.4\]]rabs gzhan du yang snying rje'i rang bzhin sems la rgyun du 'byung bas rang bzhin gtong ba zhes bya ste/_'di ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/chos la gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras kyi byang chub thag mi ring /_/zhes bya ba la/_snying rje'i gnas ni chos la gnas pa zhes bya ba ste/_de lta bu'i chos
[\[63b.5\]]la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa thag mi ring ste/_myur du 'thob po zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste zhes bya ba la/_snying rje'i dmigs pa dang 'bras bu bstan nas snying rje dang
[\[63b.6\]]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so so'i skye bo bzhin du 'khor bar gnas pa yang ma yin/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'khor bar gtogs pa thams
[\[63b.7\]]cad sdug bsngal nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_nyid kyi sgra ni rang bzhin la bya ste/_khams gsum du gtogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bar mkhyen nas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bdag med pa ni shes par byas nas kyang /_/zhes bya ba la mi rtag pa dang
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]sdug bsngal ba 'ba' zhig tu mkhyen par ma zad kyi/_stong pa dang bdag med pa yang thugs su chud do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje yod pa'i blo mchog skyo mi 'gyur/_/nyes pa dag gis gzir bar 'gyur ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
[\[64a.2\]]ba'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs par thugs su chud nas snying rje dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can gyi don dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur te/_'dis ni nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par bstan to/_/gang zag dang chos la bdag med par khong
[\[64a.3\]]du chud pa'i blo mchog dang ldan pas 'khor ba'i skyon skye rga na 'chi la sogs pas kyang gzir bar mi 'gyur la/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/_'dis ni so so'i skye bo bzhin du 'khor ba na mi gnas pa bstan to/_/de ltar na mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_
[\[64a.4\]]'khor ba la gnas pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la/_snying rje yod pas mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/_shes rab yod pas 'khor ba la gnas pa ma yin no zhes go rims bzhin du sbyar ro/_/'khor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ste zhes bya ba la/_snying rje can
[\[64a.5\]]gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par shes par bya ba la/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal nyid du blta ba na/_/sdug bsngal 'gyur zhes bya ba la/_khams gsum gyi sems can sdug bsngal
[\[64a.6\]]gyi sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin du lta zhing gzigs pas na byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_brtse bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dis ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mthong nas thugs rje skye bar
[\[64a.7\]]bstan to/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes par zhes bya ba la/_sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig tu mkhyen par ma zad kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyu kun 'byung gi bden pa las dang nyon mongs pa yang yin par mkhyen nas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yongs su spangs phyir de yi thabs shes nas/_/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung spangs te/_'gog pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/_thabs lam gang gis 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i lam dang thabs shes nas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'gog pa'i bden pa thob par bya ba'i
[\[64b.2\]]thabs lam gyi bden pa yin par thugs su chud par ston te/_snying rje can ni skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar thabs thugs su chud pas byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje can rnams sems can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar bya ba la skyo bar mi mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[64b.3\]]thabs shes pa dang skyo bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la/_skyo ba mi mnga' ba yang sdug bsngal las bsgral bar bya ba'i thabs thugs su chud pas ni mi skyo'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gis de'i sdug bsngal 'gog par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la/_thabs gang gis sems can rnams kyi
[\[64b.4\]]sdug bsngal bkag nas 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'i thabs dang lam mkhyen ces bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje'i rab tu dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na rnam pa du yod pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom ste/_byang chub
[\[64b.5\]]sems dpa'i snying rje ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_rigs kyi khyad par dang /_yon tan dang nyes pa kun brtags pa dang /_tshe gzhan la yongs su bsgom pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa'o/_/rang bzhin dang ni zhes bya ba la/_rang bzhin ni rigs la bya ste/_snying rje'i
[\[64b.6\]]rigs yod pa las snying rje 'byung ba ni rang bzhin zhes bya ste/_'dis ni rigs kyi khyad par bstan to/_/so sor rtog pa dang zhes bya ba la/_kha cig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i snying po chen po 'chad pa dag thob nas yon tan dang nyes pa kun brtags pa las snying rje 'byung
[\[64b.7\]]ba ni/_yon tan dang nyes pa kun du brtags pa'i snying rje zhes bya ste/_de la nyes pa brtags pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can la 'tshe ba dang /_zhe sdang skye bar byed pa ni snying rje can gyi cha ma yin te/_nyes pa dang skyon yin no zhes rtog pa'o/_/yang na
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]snying rje med dang /_bdag bcom pa dang sems can bcom pa la sogs pa'i skyon 'byung bar rtog pa ni nyes pa kun du rtog pa'o/_/yon tan kun du rtog pa ni sems can la byams pa dang snying rje byed pa ni snying rje dang rjes su mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cha yin no
[\[65a.2\]]zhes yon tan du rtog pa'o/_/yang na gong du bshad pa ltar nyes pa de dag thams cad ni/_byams pa la sogs gnas mi 'byung /_/nyon mongs med par sems can don/_/'khor ba 'dor bar mi byed do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du rtog pa ni yon tan rtog pa'o/_/sngon de bsgom pa'i
[\[65a.3\]]rnam par ldan pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_tshe rabs snga mar snying rje chen por goms par byas pas gar skyes kyang sngon goms pa'i mthus snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni tshe rabs gzhan la yongs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i snying rje zhes bya'o/_/mi mthun phyogs spangs rnam par dag thob phyir/_/zhes
[\[65a.4\]]bya ba la/_snying rje'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gnod sems dang 'tshe ba la sogs pa ste/_de dag spangs na rnam par dag pa'i snying rje 'thob ste/_rnam par dag ces bya ba ni/_gang la yang chags pa dang zhe sdang mi skye ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snying rje thob ces bya ba'i don to/_/mnyam
[\[65a.5\]]med rtag med snying rje can ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mnyam pa'i snying rje med na yang snying rje chen po can ma yin te/_dper na so so'i skye bo dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi snying rje lta bu'o/_/de dag ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas zil gyis non pa
[\[65a.6\]]rnams la snying rje skye'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje mi skye ba'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi snying rje med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang cung zad tshor ba bde ba myong ba dang /_cung zad sdug
[\[65a.7\]]bsngal myong ba dang /_cung zad tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong ba de dag thams cad sdug bsngal yin par thugs su chud nas ji ltar mnar med pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rje skye ba de bzhin du/_srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i sems can rnams la yang
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]thugs rje skye ste/_khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la thugs rje skye bas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje ni mnyam pa nyid de/_de bas na thugs rje chen por gzhag go/_/bar 'ga' 'byung la/_bar 'ga' ni mi 'byung ste/_rtag pa ma yin pa'i snying rje ni snying rje chen po
[\[65b.2\]]can ma yin te/_dper na rang sangs rgyas kyi snying rje lta bu'o/_/de dag gi lhag ma ni phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs na zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs rje ni phung
[\[65b.3\]]po'i lhag ma ma lus pa spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs kyang /_zad par mi 'gyur bas na rtag pa ste/_de bas na snying rje chen por gzhag go/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa med de zhes bya ba la/_gang la bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid de lhag pa'i bsam pa ma thob
[\[65b.4\]]pa/_de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ma yin te/_dper na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas lta bu'o/_/de dag ni chos la bdag med pa khong du ma chud pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ma thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la zhugs pa yan chad ni bdag dang gzhan
[\[65b.5\]]du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa'i phyir/_bdag bzhin du sems can gyi sdug bsngal yang sgrol bar byed pas lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang /_de bas na de ni snying rje chen por gzhag go/_/sgrub pa yang zhes bya ba la/_med ces bya bar sbyar te/_gang la sems can sdug
[\[65b.6\]]bsngal ba mthong nas sems la brtse ba yod pa tsam du zad kyi/_sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'i phyir sgrub par mi byed na snying rje chen po can ma yin te/_dper na 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas so/_/de dag ni sems can sdug bsngal bar shes kyang sdug bsngal las bskyab
[\[65b.7\]]pa'i phyir sgrub bar mi byed kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can sdug bsngal bar mkhyen nas sdug bsngal bskyab pa'i phyir sgrub par yang mdzad de/_de bas na snying rje chen por gzhag go/_/'dod chags bral dang zhes bya ba la/_gang la snying rje yod kyang snying rje'i mi mthun
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa'i phyogs zhe sdang dang 'tshe ba dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang 'tshe ba'i bag la nyal dang ma bral ba de dag snying rje chen po zhes mi bya ste/_dper na so so'i skye bo dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas lta bu'o/_/de la so so'i skye bo dag ni kha cig la snying rje yod kyang de nyid la
[\[66a.2\]]bar 'ga' zhe sdang 'byung ba dang /_mdza' ba la snying rje yod kyang dgra la zhe sdang yod do/_/'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhe sdang dngos su mi 'byung yang zhe sdang gi bag la nyal phra mo ma spangs so/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni 'tshe ba dang zhe sdang gi
[\[66a.3\]]bag la nyal mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad spangs pas 'dod chags dang bral ba ste/_de'i phyir snying rje chen por gzhag go/_/mi dmigs ma yin dang zhes bya ba la/_gang la dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /_brtsal 'bad dang bcas pa de dag snying rje can ma yin no/_/sa brgyad pa'i byang
[\[66a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag dang gzhan du dmigs pa dang /_/brtsal dang 'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid du snying rje 'byung bas na snying rje chen por gzhag go/_/de bzhin gang la snying rje
[\[66a.5\]]med pa byang chub min/_/zhes bya ba la/_gong du bshad pa lta bu'i mnyam pa med pas na/_mi dmigs pa ma yin pa'i bar dag gi snying rje med pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/shing ljon pa lta bur snying rje bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa lnga ste zhes bya ba la/_
[\[66a.6\]]'di man chad tshigs su bcad pa lngas shing ljon pa la dpe blangs nas/_snying rje'i shing dang 'dra bar ston te/_shing ljon pa la rtsa ba dang /_sdong po dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yod pa bzhin du/_snying rje'i shing gi rtsa ba dang /_sdong po dang /_yal
[\[66a.7\]]ga dang /_lo ma dang 'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu gang yin pa ston to/_/snying rje bzod pa sems pa dang /_smon lam skye ba sems can smin/_/'di ni snying rje'i shing yin te/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying rje'i shing gi rtsa ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'o/_/sdong po ni bzod
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa'o/_/yal ga ni sems can gyi don la sems pa'o/_/lo ma ni smon lam mo/_/skye ba ni me tog go/_/sems can smin par byed pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rtsa ba che sogs 'bras bu chen po'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_snying rje'i shing la snying rje nyid rtsa ba yin pas na rtsa ba che'o/_/
[\[66b.2\]]sogs pa'i nang du ni bzod pa sdong por gyur pas na sdong po chen po zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar te/_tha mar yang sems can yongs su smin par byed pas na 'bras bu mchog yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ni rtsa ba dang sdong po dang yal ga dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i gnas te zhes bya
[\[66b.3\]]ba la/_dper na shing ljon pa'i rtsa ba bzang po las sdong po 'byung ngo /_/sdong po las yal ga 'byung ngo /_/yal ga las lo ma 'byung ngo /_/lo ma las me tog 'byung ngo /_/me tog las 'bras bu 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i shing la yang /_snying rje
[\[66b.4\]]chen po nyid ni rtsa ba'i gnas su gzhag ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba snying rje chen po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_gzhan yang btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po yang mi zad pa ste/_
[\[66b.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dbugs phyir 'bud pa dang rngub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'o
[\[66b.6\]]zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa ga ya'i rtse mo'i mdo las kyang byang chub sems dpa'/_byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o/_/sems can ni dmigs pa'o zhes bshad do/_/gang la snying rje yod pa de dag sems can gyi don du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs bzod kyi/_
[\[66b.7\]]su la snying rje med pa de dag ni sems can gyi don du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs bzod par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na snying rje las sems can gyi don du grang ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa bzod par 'byung ste/_bzod pa ni sdong po'i gnas lta bu'o/_/de ltar bzod pa sdong po lta bu'i shugs
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]kyis sems can rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs la sems pa'i bsam pa 'byung ste bsam pa de ni yal ga'i gnas lta bu'o/_/de ltar sems can gyi don la sems pa'i bsam pa de las tshe rabs gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can
[\[67a.2\]]rnams la phan thogs par 'gyur ba'i lus dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang gnas phun sum tshogs par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa 'byung ste/_smon lam ni lo ma'i gnas lta bu'o/_/de ltar smon lam lo ma lta bu'i shugs kyis tshe rabs gar skyes gar skyes kyang bdag dang gzhan la
[\[67a.3\]]phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas bzang por skye ste/_skye ba bzang po len pa ni me tog gi gnas lta bu'o/_/de ltar skye ba bzang po blangs pa las sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa 'byung ste/_de ni 'bras bu'i gnas lta bu'o/_/de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis snying rje yod na snying rje
[\[67a.4\]]las bzod pa la sogs pa'i chos 'byung ste/_rjes su 'jug pa bstan nas/_da ni snying rje med na bzod pa la sogs pa phyi ma mi 'byung ste ldog par bstan pa'i phyir/_rtsa ba snying rje med gyur na/_/dka' bar spyod pa bzod pa med/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/dper na shing gi rtsa ba med na sdong
[\[67a.5\]]po med par 'gyur ro/_/sdong po med na yal ga med par 'gyur ro/_/yal ga med na 'dab ma med par 'gyur ro/_/'dab ma med na me tog med par 'gyur ro/_/me tog med na 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i shing la yang /_snying rje rtsa
[\[67a.6\]]bar gyur ba med na sems can gyi don phyi nang gi sdug bsngal dka' bar spyod pa thams cad bzod pa'i bzod pa sdong po lta bur gyur pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/blo ldan sdug bsngal mi bzod na/_/sems can don zhig ga la sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bzod pa sdong por
[\[67a.7\]]gyur pa lta bur med de sdug bsngal ba la mi bzod na sems can gyi don la sems pa'i bsam pa yal ga lta bur gyur pa ga la zhig yod de/_bsam pa de yang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bsam pa rnam par spangs pa'i blo/_/tshe rabs bzang por smin mi byed/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]de ltar sems can gyi don du bsams pa'i bsam pa spangs te med na sems can gyi don du tshe rabs bzang po de dang de dag tu skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam mi 'debs te/_de bas na smon lam 'dab ma lta bur gyur pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de ltar smon lam btab na yang tshe rabs bzang por skye bar mi
[\[67b.2\]]'gyur te/_de bas na tshe rabs bzang por skye ba me tog lta bu mi 'byung ngo /_/tshe rabs bzang po ma thob na/_/sems can yongs su smin byed med/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar tshe rabs bzang po me tog lta bu ma thob na sems can yongs su smin par byed mi nus te/_de bas na sems can yongs
[\[67b.3\]]su smin par byed pa 'bras bu lta bur gyur pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ltar shing ljon pa'i rtsa ba chus brlan na/_rtsa ba brtan pa dang rgyas par gyur bas de'i zhor gyis sdong po la sogs pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur ba bzhin du 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis shig gis
[\[67b.4\]]snying rje chen po rtsa bar gyur pa la/_de brlan zhing brtas par byed pa'i chu gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_snying rje'i chu ni byams pa ste/_/sdug bsngal bde ba rgya cher rgyas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/dper na shing gi rtsa ba la chus brlan na 'phel zhing rgyas pa bzhin du/_snying rje'i rtsa
[\[67b.5\]]bar gyur pa la byams pa'i chus brlan na/_snying rje'i rtsa bar gyur pa brtas shing 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de las bzod pa sdong po lta bur gyur pa la sogs pa yang brtas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji lta zhe na/_byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byams
[\[67b.6\]]pa'i sems chu dang 'dra ba snying rjes brlan na/_snying rje 'phel bar 'gyur te/_snying rje 'phel dang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyi sdug bsngal mthong nas bdag nyid sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na sems can gyi don du zhugs pa las sdug bsngal 'byung ba de nyid sdug bsngal ma yin gyi
[\[67b.7\]]bde ba rgya chen po yin te/_de bas na ci la yang mi bzod pa med pas na/_bzod pa sdong po lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rgyas bzhes bya ba ni 'di'i skabs su bzod pa la bya'o/_/yal ga 'phel zhing gyes pa ni/_/tshul bzhin yid byed shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_theg pa chen po'i don gang
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]zag dang chos la bdag med pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi don bya ba la sems pa ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya ba de bas na sems pa ni yal ga lta bur 'phel zhing gyes par blta'o/_/smon lam rgyun ni ma chad pas/_/'dab ma dag ni lhags shing skye/_/zhes
[\[68a.2\]]bya ba la/_dper na shing ljon pa yang 'dab ma rnyings pa dag ni 'dor zhing 'dab ma gsar pa dag skye zhing 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar/_byang chub sems dpa' sngar btab pa'i smon lam rgya chung ngu dang skye ba rgya chung ngu rnams ni bor nas/_phyis smon lam rgya chen po dang skye ba rgya chen po dag rgyun du len
[\[68a.3\]]cing 'dzin par byed de/_de ltar smon lam snga ma 'dor zhing phyi ma len pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa ni 'dab ma snga ma lhags shing phyi ma skye ba bzhin no/_/rnam pa gnyis kyis rkyen grub phyir/_/me tog mi stongs de las 'bras/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di ltar shing ljon pa yang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyis
[\[68a.4\]]grub ste/_nang gi rkyen gyis grub pa dang /_phyi'i rkyen gyis grub pa'o/_/de la nang gi rkyen gyis grub pa ni rtsa ba las sdong po grub/_sdong po las yal ga grub pa la sogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i shing la nang gi rkyen smon lam yongs su grub pas rang gi skye ba
[\[68a.5\]]bzang por yongs su smin pa'i phyir me tog lta bu'i skye ba yang ma stongs te/_skye ba don med par ma gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dper na shing ljon pa las chu me rlung la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rkyen gyis grogs byas na me tog las 'bras bu skye ba bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i shing
[\[68a.6\]]la yang phyi rol gyi rkyen du grub ste/_tshe rabs gang nas gang du skyes par yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'bras bu grub pas na 'bras bu yongs su ma stongs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje'i bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste zhes bya ba la/_da ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis snying rje'i
[\[68a.7\]]legs pa dang /_yon tan ston to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje chen po'i yon tan byed pa yi/_/sems can rnams ni snying rjes su mi byed/_/ces bya ba la snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje la bya'o/_/'di ltar stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yin pa bzhin du/_thugs rje chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan no/_/thugs rje chen po'i yon tan de yang sems can thams cad la dmigs na 'dod pa thob par 'gyur bas na/_sems can rnams ni snying rje chen po'i yon tan byed pa zhes
[\[68b.2\]]bya ste/_de lta bur snying rje chen po yon tan thob par byed pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje bar su zhig mi byed de kun gyis kyang snying rje bar bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/da ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis snying rje'i yon tan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_snying rje skyed pa gang yin de dag ni/_/
[\[68b.3\]]sdug bsngal na yang mtshungs med bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po gang yin pa de dag sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur gyi/_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
[\[68b.4\]]la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba las kyang 'das shing 'phags pa'i bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mdo sde rgyan bam po lnga'i bshad pa rdzogs so//_//snying rje chags pa med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste/_zhes bya ba la/_snying rjes zin pa'i byang chub
[\[68b.5\]]sems dpa' rnams/_/so so'i skye bo bzhin 'khor ba la yang ma chags mi gnas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la yang ma chags mi gnas par bstan pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rjes brlan pa'i snying rje can/_/
[\[68b.6\]]zhi ba la yang mi gnas na/_/'jig rten bde dang rang srog la/_/chags par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten pa dag ni 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi bde ba la chags pa dang /_rang gi srog dang lus la chags te/_de bas na 'khor ba la gnas pa'o/_/
[\[68b.7\]]'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang srog la chags pa med kyang sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la chags pas mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje can rnams thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]shing thugs rje'i dbang du gyur la thugs rjes zin pa rnams ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa de la yang ma chags mi gnas te/_'dis ni mya ngan las 'das pa
[\[69a.2\]]la mi gnas pa bstan to/_/de lta bu la yang ma chags na 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dang lus dang srog la chags par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_ma chags ches so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dis ni 'khor ba na mi gnas par bstan to/_/snying rjes sdug pa'i khyad par la tshigs su bcad pa
[\[69a.3\]]gsum mo zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar 'jig rten pa dag pha ma bu tsha gnyen bshes la sdug pa yod pa dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la sdug pa yod mod kyi/_de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus sems can thams cad
[\[69a.4\]]la sdug par byed pa sdug pa gzhan dang khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad pa gsum rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/kha na ma tho med pa yi/_/sdug pa med de 'jig rten min/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten pha ma la sogs pa bu tsha la sdug pa yod kyang 'jig rten pa'i sdug pa thams
[\[69a.5\]]cad ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sdug pa gang yang med de 'jig rten pa'i sdug pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba dang bcas shing sdig pa dang skyon dang bcas pa sha stag go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma byin par len pa dang /_srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las la 'dzud pas sdug bsngal gyi chu bo chen po la
[\[69a.6\]]'jog pa dang /_mi shes pa'i chu bo chen pos non pa'i phyir/_thams cad kyang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi sdug pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa yang med de/_'jig rten pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zag dang chos la bdag med
[\[69a.7\]]par ma rtogs pas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ma thob pa'i phyir ro/_/blo ldan snying rje'i sdug pa ni/_/kha na ma tho med ces 'jig rten 'das/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can la sdug par byed pa ni kha na ma tho ba yang med la
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'jig rten las 'das pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'jig rten pa'i snying rje la gnas pa rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med kyang 'jig rten pa'o zhes bya ba la/_mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rjes sems can sdug par byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa
[\[69b.2\]]drang srong la sogs pa'i snying rjes sems can la sdug par byed pa ni sdig pa la mi 'jog ste/_kha na ma tho ba med kyang bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ma thob pas 'jig rten par 'jog go/_/ji ltar kha na ma tho ba med ce na zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i
[\[69b.3\]]rgyu las byung ba'i sems can la sdug par byed pa kha na ma tho ba med do zhes bshad pa ji ltar kha na ma tho ba med ce na zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de'i phyir smras pa/_sdug bsngal chu bo chen po dang /_/mi shes mun nag gnas pa'i 'jig rten dag_/drang ba'i thabs rnams shoms pa des/_/ji ltar kha
[\[69b.4\]]na ma tho med ma yin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum dang brgyad la sogs pa'i chu bo chen po la gnas pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa'i mun pa la gnas pa ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
[\[69b.5\]]bsngal gyi chu bo la gnas pa dang mi shes pa'i mun pa la gnas pa rnams drang zhing gdon par bya ba'i thabs chen po bshams pa mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje las 'byung ba sdug ba ste/_ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te/_kha na ma tho ba med pa yid ches so zhes bya ba'i don
[\[69b.6\]]to/_/ji ltar na 'jig rten las 'das she na zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdug pa 'jig rten las 'das zhes bshad na/_byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje las byung ba'i sdug pa ste/_ji ltar na 'jig rten las 'das pa yin zhe na zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de'i phyir rang
[\[69b.7\]]byang chub tu sangs rgyas dang /_'jig rten dgra bcom de sdug med/_/de las gzhan la smos ci dgos/_/ji ltar 'jig rten 'das ma yin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten na gang zag mchog
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dang gtso bor bya ba rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams la yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje las byung ba'i sems can thams cad la sdug pa de lta bu de med na 'jig rten phal ba rnams la de lta bu'i sdug pa lta ga la zhig yod de med ces so zhes
[\[70a.2\]]bya ba'i don to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems can la sdug par lta ba 'phags pa rnams la yang med na/_'jig rten pa la lta ga la yod med na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdug par lta ba de 'jig rten las 'das pa ji ltar ma yin te/_'jig rten las 'das pa yid ches so zhes bya ba'i
[\[70a.3\]]don to/_/rang byang chub tu sangs rgyas pas na zhes bya ba la/_mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang gi blos mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byas pas na rang byang chub tu sangs rgyas pa zhes bya'o/_/skrag pa dang mngon par dga' ba'i rgyu la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems
[\[70a.4\]]dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus/_sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa btang ba'i sdug bsngal la kha cig skrag pa yod la/_byang chub sems dpa' kha cig sdug bsngal de nyid la bde bar 'dzin cing dga' ba yod de/_de bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i
[\[70a.5\]]don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal med/_/snying brtse ba yi sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de ni thog mar shin tu skrag_/ces bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus sems can gyi sdug bsngal med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa de sems can sdug bsngal ba mang du mthong
[\[70a.6\]]bas snying rje'i rgyus bdag nyid kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_dang po mos ba spyod pa'i sa na ni sdug bsngal de lta bu las bsgral bar mi nus so snyam nas skrag pa skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ma thob pa dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad stong pa nyid
[\[70a.7\]]du khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro/_/reg nas rab tu mngon par dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la reg pa ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la reg pa ste/_sa dang po rab tu dga' ba thob nas chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du rtogs pa na bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa dang /_
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]sdug bsngal thams cad stong pa nyid du khong du chud pas na sems can gyi don du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba yin yang shin tu dga' ba dang bde ba'i sems skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sdug bsngal gyi mtshan ma sems can la sdug bsngal med par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_sdug bsngal med ces
[\[70b.2\]]bya ba'i don 'chad de/_med ces bya ba ni mtshan ma'i don to/_/mtshan ma'i don yang phyir gyi don du 'dren te/_sems can gyi sdug bsngal rnam pa bdun dang brgyad la sogs pa med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa de sems can gyi sdug bsngal mthong nas byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i shugs
[\[70b.3\]]kyis bdag nyid sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur te mos pa spyod pa'i sa ni sdug bsngal des skrag par 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mos pa spyod pa'i sa na sdug bsngal gyis skrag pa ni bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid ma rtogs pa dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[70b.4\]]thams cad stong par ma rtogs pas na skrag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/reg pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sa la zhes bya ba la/_reg pa zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sa la reg pa ste sa dang po yan chad thob pa'o/_/de dag gi tshe na ni chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro
[\[70b.5\]]ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs pas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pas sdug bsngal la skrag pa mi skye ste bde bar 'dzin pa'i bsam pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje'i sdug bsngal gyis bde ba zil gyis gnon pa'i
[\[70b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi don du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba ni snying rje'i rgyu las byung ste/_sdug bsngal de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' bde bar 'dzin to/_/sdug bsngal las byung ba'i bde ba de ni bde ba thams cad kyi
[\[70b.7\]]dam pa dang mchog yin te/_des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rjes bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal ni/_/'jig rten bde ba thams cad zil gnon
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]cing /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis mgo myos pa'i sems can rnams bskyab par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i rgyu las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba yang /_
[\[71a.2\]]sems can gyi sdug bsngal skyob pa la ltos nas/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams bde ba chen por 'gyur te/_bde ba de ni bde ba thams cad kyi mchog dang phul yin pas bde ba de 'jig rten gyi lha dang mi la sogs pa'i bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon te bde ba thams cad pas lhag go
[\[71a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal nyid bde ba'i mchog tu gyur pa 'di ngo mtshar du bya ba yin par bstan pa'i phyir/_don byas pa yang de dang bral ba yin pas na/_/de las ngo mtshar che ba gzhan ci smos/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_'di ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa sdug bsngal
[\[71a.4\]]thams cad ni spangs/_bde ba thams cad ni phun sum tshogs te/_rnam pa thams cad du bdag gi don bsgrubs te de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyid bde bar gyur pa'i bde ba de lta bu med na 'jig rten phal pa lta zhig ga la yod de/_de bas na gang
[\[71a.5\]]sdug bsngal ba de nyid bde ba mchog tu gyur pa de las ngo mtshar che ba ci zhig yod de/_ngo mtshar gyi mchog tu bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje byas pa'i sbyin pa la rjes su bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten na sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa yod kyang phan btags pa'i
[\[71a.6\]]lan la re bas gtong ba dang /_sngon phan btags pas lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir gtong ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa ni de lta bu ma yin gyi/_snying rje'i shugs kyis gtong bas de ltar btang ba'i sbyin pa la yon tan dang legs pa yod pa bstan pa'i phyir/_
[\[71a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pas ni/_/bstan pa rnams la sbyin pa bde byed pa/_/khams gsum pa yi longs spyod de dag gis/_/bde ba de la de yi char mi 'gro/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gtong ba ni sems can brel
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]ba dang phongs pa rnams la thugs brtse ba'i dbang gis sbyin pa btang nas de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/_dga' ba dang bde ba de la ni khams gsum pa'i lha dang mi'i bde ba gang gis kyang brgya'i cha'am stong gi cha 'am bye ba'i cha 'am bye ba brgya
[\[71b.2\]]stong gi char yang mi phod do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pas ni/_/bstan pa rnams la bde ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don sla bas ma bshad kyi/_khams gsum pa yi longs spyod dag gis ni/_/zhes bya ba yan chad kyi tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi
[\[71b.3\]]don 'grel pas bkrol te bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rjes sdug bsngal khas len pa la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_kha cig 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don du 'khor ba khas blangs kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khas ma blangs so snyam pa la/_byang
[\[71b.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'khor ba khas blangs pas na/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyang khas blangs pa bstan pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'khor ba dag ni sdug bsngal rang bzhin te/_/sems can don du snying rje gang mi gtong /_/gzhan dag la ni
[\[71b.5\]]phan phyir sdug bsngal ni/_/snying rje can gyis khas kyang ma blangs sam/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo dag las/_skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_'dod pa ji snyed pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa sdug
[\[71b.6\]]bsngal ba dang /_mdza' ba dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba'o zhes 'khor ba yang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin du bshad la/_sdug bsngal thams cad kyang 'khor bar ma 'dus pa gang yang med de de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don
[\[71b.7\]]du snying rje'i shugs kyis 'khor ba yongs su ma btang ste/_'khor ba khas blangs na sems can gzhan la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/_snying rje can gyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad khas ma blangs pa ci zhig yod de/_sdug bsngal thams cad kyang khas blangs ches so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de'i
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'bras bu dang gsum 'phel ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can rnams chos gsum 'phel ba dang /_chos gsum gyi 'bras bu 'phel ba bstan pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje dang ni sbyin dang longs
[\[72a.2\]]spyod rnams/_/snying rje can gyis rtag tu rnam 'phel 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu chos rnam pa gsum 'phel bar 'gyur te/_chos gsum ni snying rje 'phel ba dang /_sbyin pa 'phel ba dang /_longs spyod 'phel ba'o/_/byams pa ni phan pa bskyed pa
[\[72a.3\]]dang /_de mthus byas bde de yang de las so/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum 'phel ba ni snying rje'i dbang gis sems can kun la phan par sems pa'i byams pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin pa'i dbang gis phongs pa rnams la yo byad kyis phan btags pas phan pa bskyed pa 'phel ba
[\[72a.4\]]dang /_longs spyod kyi dbang gis longs spyod las ni sems can la bde ba'i mthu bskyed pas 'phel bar 'gyur te/_longs spyod yod na gdod sems can la yo byad kyis phan gdags pa'i mthu yod pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba thams cad du gsum 'phel bar 'gyur
[\[72a.5\]]ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs kun du snying rje 'phel ba dang /_sbyin pa 'phel ba dang /_longs spyod 'phel ba ni snying rje'i stobs kyis 'phel te/_de la snying rje nyid la goms par byas pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du snying rje nyid shas cher 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[72a.6\]]phyir ro/_/sbyin pa'ang snying rje'i stobs las so/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyin pa 'phel ba yang snying rje'i stobs kyis 'phel te/_/sems can brel ba dang phongs pa rnams la snying rje yod na gdod phyi dang nang gi dngos po gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/longs spyod kyang sbyin pa'i stobs las te zhes bya ba la/_
[\[72a.7\]]tshe rabs gzhan du longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'dir sbyin pa byas pa'i stobs kyis 'phel bar 'gyur te/_tshe 'dir sbyin pa btang ba dang /_gdod tshe phyi mar longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de gsum las 'bras bu bde ba gsum du 'gyur te zhes bya ba la/_chos
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]rnam pa gsum 'phel bas 'bras bu bde ba rnam pa gsum myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rje las ni byams pa bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba la/_sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal lo snyam du sems pa'i snying rje'i chos las ni sems can rnams bde ba la gzhag par bya'o snyam du sems
[\[72b.2\]]pa'i byams pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sbyin pas ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa skyed pa'o zhes bya ba la/_sbyin pa'i chos 'phel bas ni sems can la zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/longs spyod
[\[72b.3\]]las ni de la phan gdags par bya ba'i mthu byas ba'o zhes bya ba la/_longs spyod kyi chos 'phel bas ni sems can la yo byad kyis phan gdags par bya ba'i mthu yod pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur te/_longs spyod yod na gdod sems can la zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa'i mthu
[\[72b.4\]]yod pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa la spro bar bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_dper na mi le lo can 'ga' zhig la de la phan par 'dod pa'i mi 'ga' zhig gis le lo spang bar bya ba'i phyir sems gzengs bstod cing spro ba skyed par byed pa de bzhin du/_sbyin pa le lor gyur nas sems can
[\[72b.5\]]la mi 'jug pa la/_snying rjes sbyin pa byas na yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bas sbyin pa la khyod ci'i phyir le lo byed ces sbyin pa la gzengs bstod cing spro bar byed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'phel ba dang ni rab tu spel bar bya/_/sbyin pas
[\[72b.6\]]rab tu bde bya smin par bya/_/drang bar bya zhing kun du bkri bar bya/_/snying rje le lo can la smra ba bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying rje le lo can la smra ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshig dang por bshad de/_dper na le lo can 'ga' zhig la de la phan par 'dod pa'i mi la la zhig gis le lo bya bar
[\[72b.7\]]mi rigs par smra bar byed pa dang 'dra bar sbyin pa le lo can la snying rje smra bar byed de ji ltar smra bar byed ce na/_sbyin pa byas dang yon tan drug 'phel bar 'gyur bas na sbyin pa khyod le lo byed par mi rigs so zhes sbyin pa la smra bar byed do/_/de la 'phel ba dang zhes pa ni/_sbyin pa khyod
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]kyis sbyin pa byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje 'phel bar 'gyur bas sbyin pa bya ba'i rigs te/_'dis ni snying rje'i rang bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur ba bstan to/_/de la spel bar bya zhes bya ba ni snying rje'i shugs kyis sbyin pa byas na rnam pa gnyis 'phel
[\[73a.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin pa nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de la longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni sbyin pa'i mthus ma 'ongs pa na longs spyod chen po rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_des ni longs spyod spel bar bya ba yin no/_/sbyin pa spel bar byas pa ni
[\[73a.3\]]sbyin pa'i mthus ma 'ongs pa na rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yang sbyin pa gtong ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sbyin pa spel bar byas pa yin no/_/sbyin pas rab tu smin bya zhes bya ba ni/_sbyin pa btang nas sems can bsdus te/_dge ba la gzhag pa'i sgo nas sems can smin par
[\[73a.4\]]bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bde bar byas zhes bya ba ni/_len pa po'i gang zag rnams kyang bde ba dang dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang /_gtong ba po'i gang zag rnams kyang bde ba dang dga' ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/drang bar bya zhes bya ba ni/_sbyin pa gtang ba'i sgo nas
[\[73a.5\]]bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs so/_/chos sbyin pas ni ye shes kyi tshogs sogs so/_/bkri bar bya zhes bya ba ni/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas su bkri
[\[73a.6\]]ba'am der gzhag par bya zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sbyin pa bya ba le lo can zhes bya bar sbyar ro zhes bya ba la/_mi le lo can dang /_de la phan par 'dod pa gnyis phan tshun smra ba dang 'dra bar sbyin pa le lor gyur nas sems can la mi 'jug pa la snying rje smra bar byed de/_ji ltar smra bar byed ce na/_
[\[73a.7\]]snying rje 'phel bar bya/_sbyin pas longs spyod dang sbyin pa nyid spel bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis smra bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gzhan bde bas bde ba rjes su myong ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten pa rnams ni phrag dog gi bsam pa yod pas
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gzhan bde ba mthong na bdag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_sems can rnams sdug par mthong na bdag dga' bar 'gyur gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu ma yin te/_sems can gzhan sdug bsngal na byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/_sems can gzhan bde
[\[73b.2\]]na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rjes sdug bsngal bas ni sdug bsngal na/_/gzhan bde ma bskyed ci phyir bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can
[\[73b.3\]]rnams ni snying rje'i shugs kyis sems can gzhan sdug bsngal ba mthong bas bdag nyid sdug bsngal bar mthong ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid bde ba 'dod pas sems can bde ba la ma bkod par bdag nyid bde bar ga la 'gyur te nams kyang bde bar mi 'gyur ro
[\[73b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de bas na 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can thams cad kyi nad ji srid kyi bar du bdag gi nad kyang de srid du mi 'tsho'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o/_/de bas gdag ni bde bar 'gyur 'dod na/_/snying rje gzhan gyi bde ba bskyed
[\[73b.5\]]par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar sems can sdug bsngal na byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal la sems can bde na byang chub sems dpa' bde bas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang ldan pa bdag nyid bde ba myong zhing thob par 'dod na sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba la
[\[73b.6\]]dgod par bya ste/_gzhan bde ba skyed dang gdod byang chub sems dpa' bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje bas/_/zhes bya ba ni/_snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal
[\[73b.7\]]gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/_zhes bya ba ni/_gzhan sdug bsngal ba mthong na byang chub sems dpa' nyid sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sems can rnams la bde ba skyed par ji ltar bde bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyid la sdug bsngal
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mi 'byung zhing bde ba thob par 'dod nas sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal bsal zhing sems can bde ba la dgod par bya ste/_de ltar ma byas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis bde ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying rjes sbyin pa rjes su
[\[74a.2\]]ston pa la tshigs su bcad pa drug ste zhes bya ba la/_dper na mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis slob ma la 'di ltar gyis shig ces ston cing slob par byed pa bzhin du snying rje slob dpon du gyur pas sbyin pa slob ma lta bur gyur pa la 'di lta 'di ltar gyis shig ces ston cing slob par byed de/_de bstan
[\[74a.3\]]par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sbyin pa ni phyi'i dngos po yin pas de la sems med na ji ltar bstan cing bslab ce na yang lan du sems med par bden mod kyi slob pa bzhin zhes bya bar sbyar te/_ji ltar slob dpon gyis slob ma la bslabs nas slob
[\[74a.4\]]ma las dam pa dag la 'jug par byed pa bzhin du snying rjes sbyin pa skyong nas sbyin pa las dam pa 'jug par byed pa snying rjes ni sbyin pa la slob pa bzhin no/_/snying rje can ni bdag gi sbyin pa la/_/bdag bde mi 'dod rtag tu slob par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_snying rje dang ldan pa'i
[\[74a.5\]]byang chub kyi sems kyi snying rje ni bdag bde ba mi 'dod pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad du bdag gi bde ba sems can la stobs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar snying rje bdag bde ba mi 'dod pa de rtag tu bdag nyid kyi sbyin pa la slob cing ston par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji ltar slob
[\[74a.6\]]par byed ce na/_de'i phyir/_longs spyod kyis ni bde ba pha rol lam/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_snying rje de sbyin pa la 'di ltar slob ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po'i bde ba de'ang sbyin pa khyod kyis longs spyod kyi 'bras bu de sems can gzhan gyis myong bar
[\[74a.7\]]bgyis pa de ltar gyis shig_/gal te sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de sems can gzhan la ma smin/_de bdag la smin par gyur na/_de ltar na ni rnam par smin pa de bdag la ma smin yang rung ngo zhes sbyin pa la de ltar slob par byed do/_/snying rje de sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]chen po ci'i phyir sems can la stobs par byed ce na/_de'i phyir/_bdag dang bde ba tha dad ma yin pas/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sems can sdug bsngal ni byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_sems can dang byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal gcig ste tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[74b.2\]]gzhan bde na byang chub sems dpa' bde ste/_sems can dang byang chub sems dpa' bde ba gcig cing tha mi dad pas na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po sems can rnams la sngo bar byed do/_/de med par bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems
[\[74b.3\]]dpa' dang sems can du bde ba tha mi dad de gcig pas na snying rjes sbyin pa la 'di ltar slob par byed de/_gal te sbyin pa khyod kyi 'bras bu longs spyod chen po zhig smin par byas na 'bras bu sems can rnams kyis myong bar 'gyur bar bya ba de ltar smin par gyis shig_/gal te rnam par smin pa de
[\[74b.4\]]sems can la sbyin pa med de sems can gyis myong bar ma gyur na ni/_de ltar na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la 'dod pa med pas sems can smin yang rung ngo zhes sbyin pa la zer ro/_/'bras bu bcas pa'i sbyin pa sbyin byed na/_/sems can sbyin pa'i bde bas bdag bder 'gyur/_/
[\[74b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na sbyin pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po 'ba' zhig gtong bar ma zad kyi/_sbyin pa de'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po rnam par smin pa yang sems can gyis myong bar gyur cig ces sems can la bsngo zhing sbyin par byed de/_/de ltar
[\[74b.6\]]sems can rnams la rdzas kyi dngos po sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa de'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po yang byin nas sems can bde bar gyur na de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar 'gyur gyi/_rdzas kyi dngos po btang ste sems can bde la sbyin ba'i 'bras bu longs spyod byang chub sems dpa'
[\[74b.7\]]nyid kyis myong ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' bde bar mi 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gal te khyod kyis bya ba nga la yod/_/de rnams la ni shin tu 'bras bur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying rje de sbyin pa la 'di ltar slob par byed de/_gal te sbyin pa khyod kyis nga la phan btags shing /_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po zhig sbyin par bya ba yod/_'bras bu de rnams khyod kyis sems can rnams la sbyin te/_sems can rnams kyis ji nas kyang myong bar 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis shig dang /_de ltar byas na gdod khyod kyis nga la phan btags pa
[\[75a.2\]]yin no zhes snying rje sbyin pa la de ltar ston cing slob par byed do/_/sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu de dag bdag gis sems can la byin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gtong ba'i dus na yang tshul 'di ltar gtong ste/_sbyin pa'i dngos po dang /_sbyin pa de btang
[\[75a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu gnyis ka sems can gyis myong bar gyur cig ces bsngo zhing sbyin par byed de de ltar zang zing dang 'bras bu gnyis ka sems can gyis myong ste/_sems can bde bar gyur na gdod byang chub sems dpa' bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gi phyir de nyid kyis ji tsam du 'bras bur
[\[75a.4\]]bya ba de tsam du 'bras bur 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas/_gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i dngos po dang /_'bras bu gnyi ga sems can la btang nas sems can bde bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' yang bde bar 'gyur bas/_sbyin pa khyod kyis sbyin pa ji snyed cig btang ba'i 'bras bu bdag la
[\[75a.5\]]ji tsam zhig sbyin par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bu de dag thams cad sems can la smin par gyis shig dang /_de nyid kyis nga la phan btags pa yin no zhes snying rjes sbyin pa la ston cing slob par byed do/_/sbyin pa yi ni longs spyod mi 'dod pas/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin
[\[75a.6\]]pa gtong ba yang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba de dag bdag gis myong bar ni mi 'dod de 'bras bu la thams cad nas thams cad du rgyab kyis lta zhing longs spyod myong bar bya ba la gcig tu ma myong zhes bya ba'i don to/_/longs spyod mang po mchog dang phrad gyur na/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[75a.7\]]de ltar 'bras bu la mos pa med na/_'bras bu mi 'dod du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang /_chos nyid kyis ni sbyin pa btang ba dang /_longs spyod chen po mi myong du mi rung ba yin pas gang dang gang du skyes par longs spyod mang po rgya chen po rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]rtag tu phrad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de yi bde ba dag ni bdag mi 'dod/_/sbyin pa rgyun de yang ni sbyin par 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar longs spyod rgya chen po dang phrad du zin kyang longs spyod kyi bde ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ni mi 'dod kyi ci zhig 'dod ce na/_ji ltar btang
[\[75b.2\]]ba'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i tshe rabs gzhan du yang sbyin pa rgyun du gtong zhing sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ba tsam 'dod par zad do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gi phyir sbyin pa rgyun du byed pa de rgyun du mi 'dod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_de ltar longs spyod chen po longs spyod dam pa dang rtag tu phrad kyang longs spyod kyi bde
[\[75b.3\]]ba la cung zad kyang 'dod pa med kyi/_gzhan du na bdag gi sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i 'bras bu tshe rabs gzhan du sems can rnams la sbyin pa rgyun du gtong ba dang /_sbyin pa gtong ba de rgyun mi 'chad par gtong ba tsam du zad do/_/bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la/_/snying rjes bdag la
[\[75b.4\]]rtag tu rab lta na/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan snying rje ni sbyin pa la 'di ltar slob ste/_snying rje lag na bdog pa'i dngos po phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad gtong ba yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir gtong ba ni ma yin gyi/_sems can la snying rje bas na bdag gi lag na yod pa rnams la chags
[\[75b.5\]]pa med par gtong ste/_de'ang phyi dang nang gi dngos po 'ba' zhig gtong bar ma zad kyi/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po yang sems can la yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ltar 'bras bu yang btang na sbyin pa khyod 'bras bu sems can la smin par mi byed par ci'i phyir 'bras bu bdag la rtag tu
[\[75b.6\]]lta zhing bdag la 'khor la 'bras bu bdag la smin par byed ces bya ba'i don to/_/khyod kyis yang dag shes par byos/_/bdag ni 'bras bu don mi gnyer/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bas na sbyin pa khyod kyis snying rje 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med de/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la don du mi
[\[75b.7\]]gnyer bas na snying rje 'bras bu sbyin pa ni mi rigs kyi/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang sems can la sbyin pa'i rigs so zhes sbyin pa khyod kyis de ltar shes par gyis shig ces sbyin pa la slob par byed do/_/gang bdag gis snying rjes sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad yongs su gtong bar shes par
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_snying rjes bdag gi phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad dang de'i 'bras bu sems can la rtag par btang ba yang sems can rnams la snying rje'i sgo nas rtag par gtong bar zad kyi/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la ni cung zad kyang chags pa med do zhes
[\[76a.2\]]khyod kyis de ltar shes par gyis shig ces bya ba'i don to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la rjes su bstan to zhes bya ba la/_gong du bshad pa ltar na sbyin pa khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ba'i rigs te/_snying rjes 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med pas/_'di la 'bras
[\[76a.3\]]bu sbyin par bya ba'i mi rigs kyi de'i 'bras bu sems can rnams kyis myong bar bya ba'i rigs so zhes sbyin pa khyod kyis de ltar shes par gyis shig ces sbyin pa la de ltar ston cing 'doms so/_/khyod kyis 'bras bu thob pa ma spangs na/_/sbyin pa la ni mngon par mos ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[76a.4\]]gzhan yang snying rjes sbyin pa la 'di skad smra bar byed de/_gal te ngas sbyin pa'i dngos po ni btang gi sbyin pa khyod kyis 'bras bu longs spyod chen po thob pa de bdag gis ma spangs te ma btang na/_de ltar na ni snying rje 'di sbyin pa gtong ba la ma mos pa yin no zhes sbyin pa khyod kyis de ltar rig
[\[76a.5\]]par bya ba'i rigs so/_/ji ltar skad cig tsam yang sbyin med par/_/sbyin pa la ni mngon par dga' ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar ma yin te snying rje bdag ni sbyin pa'i dngos po ni gtong la/_de'i 'bras bu mi gtong ba de lta bu'i sbyin pa la yang bdag dga' ba ma yin la/_bdag
[\[76a.6\]]ni sbyin pa mi gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa med par skad cig tsam yang gnas par mi dga' zhing ma mos pa yin te/_de bas na 'bras bu thob pa rnams kyang gtong ba dang sbyar na snying rje sbyin pa gtong ba la mngon par dga' ba yin no zhes khyod kyis de ltar shes par gyis shig ces ston to/_/
[\[76a.7\]]ma byas 'bras bur mi 'gyur bas/_/de ltar lan re yong bas nga mi mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnam pa gzhan du yang snying rjes ni sbyin pa la 'di ltar slob par byed de/_sbyin pa khyod ni sbyin pa la byas pa rnams ni 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing 'bras bu smin par mi byed pas de ltar na khyod ni
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]lan la re ba ma yin no/_/snying rjes ni gang byin yang rung ma byin yang rung /_'bras bu smin yang rung ma smin yang rung ste/_sems can kun la phan pa dang bde ba byed pa dang sems can kun gyi don sgrub par byed pas na nga ni lan la re ba med pa'i phyir khyod dang mi mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[76b.2\]]gang gis byas pa de las 'bras bur smin/_/de'i phyir khyod lan re bas nga mi mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang sbyin pa khyod ni gang gi sbyin pa byas pa de la 'bras bu smin cing sgrub par byed pas na khyod la ni lan re ba yod kyi/_nga ni sbyin pa ma byas pa la yang 'bras bu sgrub par byed de/_byas pa
[\[76b.3\]]dang ma byas pa kun la phan 'dogs pa la lan re ba med pa'i phyir khyod dang mi mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snying brtse ba sbyin pa la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la/_sbyin pa gang btang na tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan par 'gyur gyi gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni snying brtse
[\[76b.4\]]ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i sbyin pa gtang ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi brtse bas sbyin pa ni/_/kha na ma tho med cing dag pa'i gnas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du
[\[76b.5\]]phan par 'gyur ba'i snying brtse ba'i sbyin pa ni rnam pa drug ste/_kha na ma tho ba med pa sbyin pa dang /_dag pa'i gnas sbyin pa dang /_phan par byed pa sbyin pa dang /_rjes su srung bar byed pa sbyin pa dang /_tshol ba med par sbyin pa dang /_chags pa med par sbyin pa'o/_/de la kha na ma tho ba med pa ni/_
[\[76b.6\]]gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa'o zhes bya ba la/_skye bo gzhan dag la phrogs shing gnod par byas nas gzhan dag la gtong ba dang /_sems can dag bsad cing sha gzhan la sbyin par byed pa dang /_slong ba'i gang zag rnams bkren pa dang ltogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig ngan pa la sogs
[\[76b.7\]]pa smras nas/_sdug bsngal bskyed de sbyin par byed pa ni kha na ma tho ba zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i gnod pa med pa byas nas sbyin par byed pas na kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/dag pa'i gnas ni brtags pa'i dngos po sbyin pa'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_dug dang mtshon cha la
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]sogs pa ma brtags pa'i dngos po mi gtong gi dngos po gtsang ma sbyin par byed kyi/_dug dang mtshon cha dang chang lta bu sbyin par mi byed pas na dag pa'i gnas sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/phan par byed pa ni sbyin pas kun du bsrungs shing dge ba la sbyor ba'o zhes bya ba la/_/sbyin
[\[77a.2\]]pas sems can rnams bsrungs nas/_/tshe phyi mar lha dang mi'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba byed du bcug pa ni phan par byed pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/bsrung bar bcas pa ni 'khor gyi 'gro ba la gnod pa med par gzhan la sbyin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la/_bsrung bar bcas pa'i
[\[77a.3\]]sbyin pa ni sbyin pa gtong ba de yang thams cad btong nas cung zad kyang med par byas te/_bdag gi bu smad dang bran g.yog la sogs pa 'khor la gnod pa lta bur sbyin pa mi byed kyi phyi na yang 'khor la gnod pa med par cung zad 'jog pa'o/_/yang na bsrung ba dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa ni gang
[\[77a.4\]]zag byang chub sems dpa' de bu smad dang bran g.yog la sogs pa gzhan la gtong bar byed pa yang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnams la gtong bar mi byed pa'o/_/tshol ba med pa ni phongs pa'i don shes nas ma blangs par bdag nyid kyis sbyin
[\[77a.5\]]zhing sbyin gnas yongs su mi tshol ba'o zhes bya ba la/_tshol ba med pa'i sbyin pa ni sems can phongs pa dang brel ba'i skabs shes nas gzhan gyis ma blangs par yang bdag nyid kyi lag nas gtong bar byed pa dang /_'di la sbyin 'di la mi sbyin zhes bsod nams kyi zhing mi tshol gyi
[\[77a.6\]]snyoms par sems can kun la gtong bar byed pa'o/_/chags pa med pa ni lan dang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la/_chags pa med pa'i sbyin pa ni bdag gis sbyin pa 'di btang bas slar bdag la phan 'dogs par shog shig ces lan la chags pa med pa dang /_sbyin pa
[\[77a.7\]]btang ba 'dis tshe rabs gzhan rnam par smin pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par gyur cig ces rnam par smin pa la chags pa med par gtong bas na mi chags pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam pa gzhan du na zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rjes sbyin pa rnam pa gcig bshad nas
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gzhan yang tshe rabs 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan par 'gyur ba'i thugs rjes sbyin pa'i rnam grangs gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to/_/thams cad rgyas dang gtso bo dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_thams cad gtong ba dang /_rgyas par gtong ba dang /_gtso bor gtong ba
[\[77b.2\]]zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de la phyi nang gnyi ga gtong bas na/_thams cad gtong ba'o/_/chung ngu dang nyung ngu mi gtong gi chen po dang mang po gtong bas na rgyas par gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/dngos po zhigs pa dang /_rul ba dang /_spyad du mi rung ba mi gtong gi kha dog dang dbyibs dang /_dri phun
[\[77b.3\]]sum tshogs shing bzang po gya nom pa gtong bas na gtso bo gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/rtag dang dga' dang zang zing med/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtag tu gtong ba dang /_dga' bar gtong ba dang /_zang zing med par gtong ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de la skad cig ma gcig la gtong /_skad cig ma gcig la mi gtong /_nyin
[\[77b.4\]]gcig gtong /_nyin gcig mi gtong /_lo 'ga' gtong lo 'ga' mi gtong ba ma yin gyi/_rgyun mi 'chad par gtong bas na rgyun du gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/ser sna'i sems med par dga' ba dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'di la gtong 'di la mi gtong zhes brtags pa med kyi/_thams
[\[77b.5\]]cad la snyoms par gtong bas na dga' bas gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/tshe 'dir lan la re ba med pa dang /_tshe rabs gzhan du rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas na zang zing med par gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/dag dang byang chub bsngo dang dge ba bsngo/_/zhes bya ba la/_dag pa gtong ba dang /_byang
[\[77b.6\]]chub tu bsngo ba gtong ba dang /_dge ba bsngo ba'i gtong ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de la dag pa gtong ba ni gong du dag pa'i gnas sbyin pa dang don gcig ste/_dug dang mtshon cha dang chang la sogs pa brtags pa'i dngos po mi gtong bas na dag pa gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa byas pa rnams
[\[77b.7\]]'jig rten gyi lha'am mi'am nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir mi bsngo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo bas na byang chub tu bsngo ba gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/dge ba la bsngo ba'i don ni gong du phan par byed pa'i sbyin pa bshad pa dang don gcig ste/_sbyin pas bsdus
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]nas dge ba la bkod pa ni dge ba la bsngo ba'i gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/spyad par bya ba'i khyad par gyi tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten pa dag sbyin pa byas nas longs spyod dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag sbyin pa btang
[\[78a.2\]]nas zag pa med pa'i bde ba myong ba yod mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji ltar bde ba gsum
[\[78a.3\]]gyis tshim pa'i yid/_/snying rje can gyi gtong ba dag rnyed ltar/_/longs spyod can dag longs spyod dag gis ni/_/de ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gtong ba na bde ba gsum gyis yid tshim par 'gyur te/_bde ba gsum ni sbyin na
[\[78a.4\]]dga' ba'i bde ba dang /_pha rol la phan btags pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs rdzogs pas dga' ba'i bde ba'o/_/de ltar bde ba gsum gyis tshim pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang ldan pas sems can la sbyin pa yongs su btang nas btang ba'i
[\[78a.5\]]'og tu sems can la phan thogs par mthong ste/_sems dga' ba dang bde ba rnyed pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phyi nang gi dngos po kun btang ste/_sems can rnams longs spyod dang ldan par byas pa'i sems can longs spyod can de dag de tsam gyis dga' ba dang
[\[78a.6\]]bde ba mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can rnams gzhan la sbyin pa yongs su btang nas sems can la phan thogs par mthong ste dga' ba'i khyad par skyes pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i sgo nas longs spyod can du byas pa'i sems
[\[78a.7\]]can longs spyod can dag de tsam gyi dga' ba mi skye ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa yongs su btang nas bde ba rnam pa gsum gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_bde ba rnam pa gsum ni sbyin pas dga' ba dang /_pha rol la phan btags pas dga' ba dang /_byang chub
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]kyi tshogs rdzogs pas dga' ba'o/_/sbyin pas dga' ba dang zhes bya ba la/_sbyin pa gtong ba na slong ba rnams tshogs shing 'dus pa mthong nas dang por dga' ba ni sbyin pas dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/pha rol la phan btags pas dga' ba dang zhes bya ba la/_slong ba 'dus pa'i 'og tu zang zing rnams
[\[78b.2\]]gzhan la byin nas/_des sems can la phan thogs par mthong ste dga' ba ni/_phan btags pas dga' ba zhes bya ba ste/_bar du dga' ba'o/_/byang chub kyi tshogs rdzogs pas dga' ba'o zhes bya ba la/_dngos po btang ste dga' ba la gzhan la phan thogs pa'i rgyus bsod nams
[\[78b.3\]]dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par mthong nas dga' ba ni byang chub kyi tshogs rdzogs pas dga' ba zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni tha mar dga' ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser
[\[78b.4\]]sna la sogs pa la gnas pa rnams la thugs brtse nas/_/sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste/_/de bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ser snas snying
[\[78b.5\]]rje ma rungs snying rje dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ser sna ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po gtong bar mi nus shing zang zing mi dgos pa dag sdud par byed pa ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas/_ser sna'i skyon dag brjod cing sbyin pa'i chos la 'jog par mdzad do/_/ma rungs pa ni ngan
[\[78b.6\]]pa'i ngang tshul can te srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa byed pa'i sgo nas sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/_/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas tshul khrims ngan pa'i skyon dag brjod nas tshul khrims la 'jog par mdzad do/_/'khrug pa bag med snying rje dang /_/zhes
[\[78b.7\]]bya ba la/_zhe sdang gi sems 'tshig par byas pa ni 'khrug pa zhes bya ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas zhe sdang gi skyon dag smos shing bzod pa la 'jog par mdzad do/_/bag med pa ni nyal ba dang 'phres pa la sogs pa'i las la dga' bas le lo'i dbang gis
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]dge ba'i las mi byed pa ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas le lo'i skyon dag brjod cing brtson 'grus la 'god par mdzad do/_/yul gyi dbang du song la snying rje dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan
[\[79a.2\]]la sems g.yengs pa ni yul gyi dbang du song ba zhes bya ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas sems g.yengs pa'i skyon dag brjod cing bsam gtan la 'jog par mdzad do/_/log par mngon par zhen la snying rje'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_log par mngon par
[\[79a.3\]]zhen pa ni bdag rtag pa la sogs par 'dzin pa ste/_mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i log pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa rnams so/_/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thugs brtse nas log pa'i shes rab kyi skyon dag brjod cing yang dag pa'i shes rab la 'jog par mdzad do/_/'di dag ni pha
[\[79a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_ser sna nas log par lam mngon par zhen pa rnams ni sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs te/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa'i sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying
[\[79a.5\]]brtse ba ni snying rje zhes bya'o/_/de'ang de dag gi mi mthun par phyogs rnam par sun 'byin pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_ser sna la sogs pa de dag kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin te/_snying rjes ser sna la sogs pa'i skyon brjod cing sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu
[\[79a.6\]]phyin pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya'o/_/snying rje'i rkyen bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_'di ltar mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa rnams dmigs pa dang /_rgyu dang bdag po dang /_de ma thag pa'i rkyen las skye
[\[79a.7\]]ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje yang dmigs pa dang rgyu dang bdag po dang de ma thag pa ste rkyen bzhi las skye ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bde dang mi bde'i rgyu las byung /_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs su
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bcad pa phyed kyis snying rje'i dmigs pa'i rkyen bstan to/_/de la snying rje'i dmigs par bya ba'i yul ni tshor ba bde ba dang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la bya'o/_/rgyu dang bshes gnyen rang bzhin las/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'o/_/
[\[79b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_tshe rabs gzhan du snying rje la goms par byas pas kun gzhi la snying brtse ba'i bag chags bsags pa ni snying rje'i rgyu'i rkyen to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i dbang gis snying rje skye ste/_de ni bdag po'i rkyen te/_snying rje dang ldan
[\[79b.3\]]pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba snga ma 'gags/_de dang rang bzhin gcig la snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba phyi ma 'byung ste/_snga ma 'gags pa ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen to/_/tshor ba rnam pa gsum la dmigs nas sdug bsngal gsum gyis snying rje bar byed do/_
[\[79b.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bde ba dang /_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa la dmigs nas snying rje skye ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshor ba gsum la sdug bsngal rnams kyis khyab par gzigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la tshor
[\[79b.5\]]ba bde ba la ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab par dmigs so/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis khyab par dmigs so/_/bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba la ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis khyab par dmigs so/_/sdug
[\[79b.6\]]bsngal dang bde ba'i tshor ba'i rgyu ni bde ba dang mi bde ba ste/_phyir zhing de bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bskyed pa'i rgyu dang /_bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed pa'i rgyu ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i bag la nyal dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i bag la nyal ba la bya ste/_don du
[\[79b.7\]]bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba bag chags kyi rang bzhin la de'i rgyu zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir bag la nyal la rgyu zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar bag chags de las tshor ba bde ba dang sdug bsngal gnyis yang nas yang du 'byung zhing skye ba'i phyir ro/_/snying rje chen po'i rang
[\[80a\]]
