[\[178b.3\]]de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi skabs su byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa dang /_rnam pa dang /_rang bzhin dang /_khyad par la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i lam rdzogs par bshad do/_/de la bslab pa'i lam de dag la slob pa'i
[\[178b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan rnam pa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/_yon tan gnyis po gang zhe na/_bsgrub pa'i yon tan dang /_rab tu bsngags pa'i yon tan te/_de bas na byang chub kyi skabs kyi 'og tu yon tan gyi skabs bshad par 'brel to/_/de la bsgrub
[\[178b.5\]]pa'i yon tan ni rnam pa gsum ste/_rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dang /_'brel ba'i yon tan dang /_sems can la mngon du lta ba'i yon tan no/_/de la rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan ni bslab pa'i lam de dag la dus ring por goms par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' nyid lam gyi
[\[178b.6\]]ngo bor 'gyur te/_de bas na rtag tu yang lam sngar skyes pa rnams bstan pa dang /_dge ba ma skyes pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de yang /_rang gi lus ni yongs su gtong /_/zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/_rtog pa med pa'i shes rab ni/_/blo ldan dag gis ngo mtshar
[\[178b.7\]]shes/_/zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to/_/'brel pa'i yon tan ni mthong ba dang /_bsgom pa'i lam gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis spangs nas sangs rgyas kyi sar gnas rnam par dag pa thob pa ste/_de yang de bzhin
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]gshegs pa'i rigs su ste zhes bya bas ni mthong ba'i lam bstan to/_/lung bstan pa ni thob pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang zhes bya bas ni bsgom pa'i lam bstan to/_/byang chub kyang thob par ngo mtshar che bar 'dod ces bya bas sgrib pa gnyis dang bral
[\[179a.2\]]ba'i gnas rnam par dag pa thob par bstan to/_/de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can thams cad dang bdag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob par 'gyur te/_de yang /_ji ltar blo ldan sems can la/_/byams pas rab tu byed pa bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[179a.3\]]sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bstan to/_/sems can la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed de/_de yang /_snod du yang ni byed pa yang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su
[\[179a.4\]]bcad pa bcu drug gis bstan te/_de ltar sems can la sems mnyam pa nyid thob pa dang /_sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid sems can la mngon par lta ba'i yon tan can zhes bya ba'o/_/ngo mtshar che ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum mo
[\[179a.5\]]zhes bya bas/_gang so so'i skye bo dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa la med cing mi srid pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che ba zhes bya ste/_ngo mtshar che ba'i chos de la dbye na du yod pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ston to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[179a.6\]]de la tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa sgrub pa la ngo mtshar che ba dang /_'bras bu thob pa la ngo mtshar che ba bstan to/_/rang gi lus ni yongs su gtong /_/zhes bya ba la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bza' ba dang /_bgo ba
[\[179a.7\]]la sogs pa tsam gyi dngos po gtong ba ni 'jig rten pa dag dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la yang srid pas ngo mtshar che ba ma yin gyi/_gang 'dod pa rnam pas mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa yang yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]kyis sbyin pa la ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sdom pa'i phyir ni phun sum tshogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dge slong pha dang dge slong ma la sogs pa sdom pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba'i phyir 'khor los
[\[179b.2\]]sgyur ba la sogs pa longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yang mi gtsang ba dang mchil ma'i rdog bu bzhin du bor nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par len pa la ngo mtshar du bya ba yin
[\[179b.3\]]no/_/nyam chung ba la bzod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa dbang dang mthu dang stobs la sogs pa che bas gnod pa byas pa rnams nyams su len cing bzod par byed pa ni ngo mtshar ci che sprang po dang gdol bu la sogs pa mthu dang dbang chung ba
[\[179b.4\]]rnams kyis gnod pa sna tshogs byas pa la yang nyams su len cing bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo mtshar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/lus dang srog la mi lta bar/_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang zhes bya ba la brtson 'grus
[\[179b.5\]]la yang nyan pa dang sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba 'ga' tsam byed pa'am dge ba cung zad tsam byed pa ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin gyi/_dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa na/_lus la grang ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal byung ba nyams su len cing srog la bab pa
[\[179b.6\]]na yang brtson 'grus mi gtong bar lus dang srog la mi phangs par byas nas brtson 'grus rgya chen por rtsom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus la ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bsam gtan gyi bde ba dag la ma chags te zhes bya ba la bsam
[\[179b.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dam pa mchog thob na yang de la dga' ba dang bde bar bya ba 'dzin cing bsam gtan gyi bde ba spangs nas/_slar 'dod pa'i khams su ngan song gsum la sogs pa'i gnas man
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]chad du skye bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rtog pa med pa'i shes rab ste/_/blo ldan dag gis ngo mtshar shes/_/zhes bya ba la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang shes rab ni chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid 'byed
[\[180a.2\]]pa yin na/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos la yang yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa gang la yang mi rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab la ngo mtshar du bya ba yin te/_de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa la
[\[180a.3\]]ngo mtshar che ba bstan to/_/da ni 'bras bu thob pa la ngo mtshar che ba ston te/_de la 'bras bu la yang slob pa'i 'bras bu dang /_mi slob pa'i 'bras bu ste rnam pa gnyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ste/_/zhes bya ba la mos pa spyod pa'i sa man
[\[180a.4\]]chad na so so'i skye bo'i rigs su gnas pa las sa dang po thob pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa thob ste/_de yang ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni chos kyi dbyings dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te/_des sa dang po thob
[\[180a.5\]]pa nas sa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas na sa bcu pa'i mdo las kyang de'i tshe de'i bdag nyid kyis chos thob pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te/_'di ni slob pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gcig thob
[\[180a.6\]]pa'o/_/lung bstan pa thob pa dang zhes bya ba la sa brgyad pa thob pa'i dus na rtsol ba dang 'bad pa thams cad las 'das nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa thob ste/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
[\[180a.7\]]thob pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ni slob pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob pa'o/_/dbang bskur ba dang zhes bya ba la sa dgu pa las 'das nas sa bcu thob pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]kyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar mdzad de/_de'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ni slob pa'i 'bras bu gsum thob pa'o/_/byang chub kyang thob pa zhes bya ba la/_sangs rgyas kyi sar bla na med pa'i byang
[\[180b.2\]]chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa thob pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar du bya ba ste/_'dis ni mi slob pa'i 'bras bu mchog thob pa bstan to/_/'di dag la ni ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na/_gong du bshad pa'i chos de lta bu dag ni so so'i skye bo dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[180b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa la yod pa mi srid pas de'i phyir ngo mtshar du bya ba'o/_/ngo mtshar mi che bar rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_gong du bshad pa lta bu'i chos de dag 'jig rten dang nyan thos la sogs pa de dag la ltos na ni ngo mtshar du bya ba yin mod kyi/_
[\[180b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rlabs po che dang 'dra ba rnams la/_de ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dod chags bral dang snying rje dang /_/sgom pa dag ni dam pa dang /_/de bzhin sems ni mnyam pa la/_/de
[\[180b.5\]]la sbyor ba ngo mtshar min/_/zhes bya ba la gang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rnyed pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang /_/bsgom pa dam pa la bsgom pa dang /_bdag dang sems can du mnyam pa'i sems rnyed pa dag gis gong du bshad pa lta bu pha rol tu phyin pa dag la sbyor
[\[180b.6\]]zhing byang chub dam pa'i bar dag thob par gyur pa la/_ngo mtshar mi che ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod la sogs pa la yang mi gtsang ba lta bur 'du shes pa rnyed cing longs spyod la chags pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su
[\[180b.7\]]gtong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar du che ba ma yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang nor la ma byin par mi len pa la sogs pa'i tshul khrims srung bar byed pa ni ngo
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]mtshar du mi che ba yin no/_/gzhan yang snying rje khyad par can dang ldan pas bdag gi lus dang srog las kyang sems can la phangs par 'dzin te/_sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su len
[\[181a.2\]]pa des sems can gzhan gyi gnod pa byas nas slar gnod pa mi byed cing bzod pa byed pa ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin no/_/'di ltar lo re re nyi ma re re skad cig ma re re la dge ba rgyun ma chad par sgom nus pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos zhi gnas sgom pa'i sems
[\[181a.3\]]dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lhag mthong bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi sar ro la ma chags pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang /_ci la yang mi rtog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[181a.4\]]bsgom pa dam pa ste de lta bu dang ldan pa rnams sa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa dang /_sa brgyad pa la rtsol ba dang 'bad pa thams cad las 'das pas rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa thob pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung
[\[181a.5\]]bstan pa thob pa dang /_sa bcu la dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sar mngon par byang chub pa yang ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gzhan yang bdag gang yin pa sems can yang de yin/_sems can gang yin pa bdag kyang de yin no
[\[181a.6\]]zhes bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pas bdag gi don la 'jug pa bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa yang ngo mtshar mi che ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bsgom pa dam pa la brten
[\[181a.7\]]nas sa brgyad pa la mngon par 'du byed pa med cing /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa la sbyor ba ni ngo mtshar ma yin no zhes bya ba la bsgom pa dam pa ni skad cig ma re re la yang dge ba rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i zhi gnas
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bsgom pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lhag mthong bsgom pa ste/_bsgom pa thob pa de lta bu thob pa la brten nas lus dang srog la yang mi phangs par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi ro la mi chags pa dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang
[\[181b.2\]]sa brgyad pa thob nas/_mngon par 'du mi byed cing /_rtsol ba dang 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang shes rab thob pas/_lung bstan pa thob pa dang /_sa bcu dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sar mngon par byang chub pa thob pa ni ngo
[\[181b.3\]]mtshar du bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sems mnyam pa la tshigs su bcad pa gsum mo zhes bya ba la gong du bshad pa ltar/_ngo mtshar chen po'i chos dang /_ngo mtshar mi che ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur te/_
[\[181b.4\]]ji ltar sems mnyam pa de tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bstan to/_/tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i don ni sems can la sems mnyam pa dang /_sems can gyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa la mnyam pa'o/_/ji ltar blo ldan sems can la/_/
[\[181b.5\]]byams pa rab tu byed pa bzhin/_/de ltar bdag dang chung ma dang /_/bu grogs rtsa lag rnams la min/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar blo dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can thams cad la byams pa dang sdug pa dang phangs pa dang gces pa'i sems su thams cad
[\[181b.6\]]'byung ba de ltar sems can dag bdag nyid la/_bdag nyid de tsam du sdug pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ba dang /_khyim thab chung ma la de tsam du sdug pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ba dang /_pha ma bu la de tsam du sdug pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ba dang grogs rnams la de tsam du
[\[181b.7\]]sdug pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ba dang /_nye du dag kyang nye du la de tsam du sdug pa'i bsam pa mi 'byung ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dag la bar 'ga' bdag nyid la bdag nyid zhe sdang skyes nas dug za ba dang /_g.yang du mchong ba la sogs pa byed cing bdag
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]nyid kyis bdag nyid la gsod pa yod do/_/de bzhin du nye du la sogs pa dang /_nye du dag la brdeg btsog pa dang /_gsad pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa dang /_sems mnyam pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad
[\[182a.2\]]la sdug par byed cing dus thams cad du sdug par byed pas na sems can la sems mnyam pa ste/_'dis ni sems can la sems mnyam pa bstan to/_/'dod pa la ni nye mgon med/_/ces bya ba la 'dod pa la ni bza' ba dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i zang zing bram ze dang
[\[182a.3\]]khyim bdag la sogs pa ste/_nye mgon med pa ni mdza' ba dang bshes pa 'ba' zhig la zang zing gtong ba ma yin gyi mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_phongs pa dang ma phongs par kun la yang 'dra bar yo byad yongs su gtong ba ni nye mgon med pa zhes bya'o/_/de
[\[182a.4\]]lta bu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam par bsgrub pa'o/_/tshul khrims rtag tu ma nyams shing /_/zhes bya ba la tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis te/_rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba srung ba dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba srung ba'o/_/de la rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba srung
[\[182a.5\]]ba ni phas pham pa bzhi mi 'byung bar srung ba'o/_/bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba srung ba ni phyed yol phan chad zan mi bza'o zhes bcas pa dang /_rtsa mi bcad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcas pa'i rnam pa bsrung ba ste/_de la ji ltar rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba mi 'byung bar srung ba bzhin du bcas
[\[182a.6\]]pa'i kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam tshun chad kyang mi 'byung bar srung zhing /_de la bar 'ga' srung /_bar 'ga' mi srung ba ma yin gyi dus thams cad du srung ste/_de ni tshul khrims rtag tu ma nyams pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam par bsgrub pa'o/_/
[\[182a.7\]]thams cad du bzod pa dang zhes bya ba la yul thams cad du bzod pa dang dus thams cad du bzod pa dang sems can thams cad du bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la shar phyogs su ni bzod par bya'i/_nub phyogs su ni bzod par mi bya zhes bya ba med pas phyogs bcu thams cad du yang
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bzod par byed pa ni yul thams cad du bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/'das pa'i dus su ni bzod par bya'i ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ni mi bzod ces bya ba med kyi dus gsum thams cad du'ang bzod par byed pa ni dus thams cad du bzod pa'o/_/de la bshes pa dang mdza' ba rnams la ni bzod
[\[182b.2\]]par bya'i dgra la sogs pa la bzod par mi bya'o/_/dbang dang mthu che ba rnams la ni bzod par bya'i/_dbang chung zhing nyam chung ba rnams la ni bzod par mi bya zhes bya ba med par ji ltar mdza' ba'i rnams la bzod pa bzhin du dgra la yang bzod par byed la/_'di ltar dbang mthu
[\[182b.3\]]che ba'i rnams la bzod par byed pa bzhin du mthu chung ngu'i rnams la yang bzod par byed pas na sems can thams cad la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bur bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam par bsgrub pa'o/_/thams cad don la brtson chen rtsom/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar bdag
[\[182b.4\]]gi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ji ltar dge ba gcig 'grub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de ltar dge ba thams cad 'grub par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom
[\[182b.5\]]pa'i don chen thams cad la brtson chen rtsom pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam par bsgrub pa'o/_/rtag tu dge ba'i bsam gtan dang /_/zhes bya ba la bsam gtan rnam pa gsum ste nyon mongs pa can dang dag par gyur pa dang zag pa med pa'o/_/
[\[182b.6\]]de la bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro la chags pa'i bsam gtan ni nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ro la ma chags pa'i bsam gtan ni dag par gyur pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan la mi gnas kyi dag par gyur pa'i bsam gtan dang /_zag pa med pa'i
[\[182b.7\]]bsam gtan la bsgom la/_de'ang bar 'ga' bsgom/_bar 'ga' mi bsgom pa ma yin gyi dus thams cad du bsgom pas rtag tu dge ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam par bsgrub pa'o/_/shes rab kyang ni rnam mi
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]rtog_/zhes bya ba la/_shes rab kyis chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngos bzhin du rtog gi yod par yang mi rtog_/med par yang mi rtog_/rtag par yang mi rtog_/mi rtag par yang mi rtog pa ni shes rab rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu ni shes rab
[\[183a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyam pa nyid du bsgrub pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/sems mnyam par ni shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gong du bshad pa lta bur bsgrub pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa la sems mnyam pa yin par shes par bya ste/_de ltar tshigs
[\[183a.3\]]su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni sems can gyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa la sems mnyam pa bstan to/_/phan 'dogs pa rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug go zhes bya ba la/_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pa de sems can la
[\[183a.4\]]sems mnyam pas byams pa dang sdug par sems pa tsam du ma zad kyi/_lus dang srog dag gi sgo nas phan 'dogs par byed de/_de ltar phan 'dogs par byed pa de rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug gis bstan pa la de la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni pha
[\[183a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa drug gis phan 'dogs par byed pa bstan to/_/tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhis ni pha ma la sogs pas bu tsha la sogs pa la phan 'dogs pa bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pa bstan to/_/snod du yang ni byed
[\[183a.6\]]pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sems can rnams la bza' ba dang bgo ba la sogs pas phongs nas/_nyan pa dang sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba byed mi nus pa ni snod du ma gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can bza' ba dang /_bgo ba la
[\[183a.7\]]sogs pa'i yo byad kyis phongs par gyur nas dge ba spyod mi nus pa rnams la zang zing byin nas/_phongs pa dang brel ba med par byas te/_dge ba byed du bcug pa ni snod du byed pa zhes bya ste/_sbyin pas ni de ltar phan 'dogs par byed do/_/de bzhin tshul khrims
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'jog pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa bzhin du sems can gzhan yang sdom pa'i tshul khrims la 'jog par byed de/_tshul khrims kyis ni de ltar phan 'dogs so/_/gnod pa la
[\[183b.2\]]ni bzod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la sems can gzhan dag gis lus kyi sgo nas brdeg pa la sogs pa byas pa dang /_ngag gi sgo nas tshig rtsub po smras kyang slar lus dang ngag gis lan mi ldon pa ni gnod pa la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_bzod pas ni de ltar phan
[\[183b.3\]]'dogs par byed do/_/don spyod par ni 'gro ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la don spyod pa ni sems can gyi las su bya ba la sgrub pa ste/_sems can gyi las su bya ba ni grogs bya ba'i phyir thag ring po'i gnas dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i gnas dag tu yang 'gro zhing grogs
[\[183b.4\]]byed pa ni don spyod pas 'gro ba zhes bya ste/_brtson 'grus kyis ni de ltar phan 'dogs so/_/bstan pa la yang 'dzud par byed/_/ces bya ba la gang bsam gtan dang ldan pa de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu rnyed pa yin te/_de bas na bsam gtan gyis 'bar ba dang 'thul ba la
[\[183b.5\]]sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan nas/_sems can dad pa bskyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste bsam gtan gyis ni de ltar phan 'dogs par byed do/_/the tshom yang dag sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sems can
[\[183b.6\]]rnams theg pa gsum gyi chos mi shes shing de dag la yod dam med snyam du blo gnyis su 'jug pa ni the tshom zhes bya ste/_de dag la theg pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par bshad nas shes pa dang blo rnam pa gnyis med par byas pa ni the tshom yang dag par sel ba zhes bya
[\[183b.7\]]ste/_shes rab kyis ni de ltar phan 'dogs so/_/blo ldan rnams kyis sems can la/_/phan 'dogs par ni 'di dag 'dod/_/ces bya ba la gong du bshad pa lta bur pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can gyi don sgrub pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa las phan 'dogs pa zhes bya ste/_
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis phan 'dogs par byed pa bstan to/_/tshigs su bcad pa lhag mas ni ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar phan 'dogs pa bstan to zhes bya ba la/_'di man chad tshigs su bcad pa bzhis ni mas
[\[184a.2\]]bu la phan 'dogs pa dang /_phas bu la phan 'dogs pa dang /_nye dus nye du la phan 'dogs pa dang /_grogs pos grogs po la phan 'dogs pa dang /_bran gyis rje bo la phan 'dogs pa dang /_slob dpon gyis slob ma la phan 'dogs pa dang /_mkhan pos slob ma la
[\[184a.3\]]phan 'dogs pa dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pa bstan to/_/las lnga dag gis sems can gyi/_/rgyal sras ma dang 'dra ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mas bu la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
[\[184a.4\]]dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi ma dang 'dra ba yin no/_/de la mas bu la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i las lnga po gang zhe na/_skye gnas 'dzin pa dang gcig_/skyed par
[\[184a.5\]]byed pa dang gnyis/_mthun par byed pa dang gso ba dang shin tu skyed par byed pa dang gsum/_ngan las srung bar byed pa dang bzhi/_smra ba yang slob par byed pa dang lnga'o/_/bsam pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams/_/rtag tu de bzhin 'dzin par byed/_/ces bya ba la 'di ltar
[\[184a.6\]]ma ni bu ma byung gi bar du mi bde ba bzhin du/_bu mngal na 'dzin par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems can sdug bsngal ba gcig mi gtong ste/_'dzin pa bzhin du snying rje'i sems de nyid kyis sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyang mi gtong zhing
[\[184a.7\]]'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du 'dzin par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni ma dang 'dra'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma lta bu'o/_/snying rje chen po ni ma ma lta bu'o/_/'phags pa'i sar ni skyed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos mchog
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'das nas nyan thos kyi tshul gyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang /_'gog par yang snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa dag ni 'phags pa'i sa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni 'jig rten
[\[184b.2\]]gyi chos mchog 'das nas sa dang po yan chad sangs rgyas kyi sa man chad la 'phags pa'i sa zhes bya ste/_'di ltar mas bu ma shi ba dang /_mi gnod par lto nas 'byin cing skyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sems can rnams 'phags pa'i sa de dag tu 'byin cing
[\[184b.3\]]'jog la skyed par byed pas na ma lta bur gyur pa'o/_/dge ba yang ni 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la ji ltar mas bu skyes nas nu ma nu par byed pa dang /_kha zas kyis gsos par byed pa dang /_chus bkrus pa dang /_mar gyis mnye ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas bu'i lus cher bskyed pa
[\[184b.4\]]la sogs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi dge ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba thams cad 'phel zhing skyed par byed pas na ma dang 'dra'o/_/de la 'jig rten gyi dge ba ni so so'i skye bo'i dus na pha rol tu
[\[184b.5\]]phyin pa drug spyod pa'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba ni sa dang po yan chad pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub pa'o/_/nyes byas yongs su bsrung ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar mas bu la g.yang sa dang /_ngam grog la
[\[184b.6\]]sogs par mi ltung bar 'gyur ba srung bar byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams ngan song gsum du ltung bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi nyes pa byed pa dang /_ngag gi nyes pa byed pa dang /_yid kyi nyes pa byed pa las bsrung zhing bzlog
[\[184b.7\]]par byed pas na ma dang 'dra ba yin no/_/nyan cing shes par byed pa ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar mas bu la 'jig rten gyi ming dang /_tshig dang /_brda dang /_tha snyad rnams lobs pa dang mkhas par gyur pa slob par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sangs rgyas
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams las dam pa'i chos nyan pa nas/_ji ltar mnyan pa'i chos sems can la ston cing slob par byed de/_de bas na ma dang 'dra'o/_/las lnga yis ni sems can gyi/_/rgyal sras pha dang mtshungs pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar
[\[185a.2\]]phas bu la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi pha dang 'dra ba yin no/_/ji ltar phas las rnam pa lngas bu la phan 'dogs she na/_
[\[185a.3\]]las rnam pa lnga ni sa bon 'debs par byed pa dang /_bzo slob par byed pa dang /_mthun pa'i mna' ma len par byed pa dang /_grogs po dam pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang /_bu lon med par byed pas phan 'dogs so/_/dad pa sems can thams cad la/_/thams cad
[\[185a.4\]]du ni skyed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar phas bu'i lus skyed par byed pa'i sa bon khu ba ma bzhag na ni bu'i lus skye bar mi 'gyur bas lus rgyu khu ba 'jog par byed do/_/de bzhin du dad pa yang theg pa gsum gyi lus thob par byed pa'i sa bon yin te/_de bas na byang chub
[\[185a.5\]]sems dpa' de rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa'i phyir/_sems can gyi sems kyi rgyu la dad pa'i sa bon 'jog par byed de/_de'i phyir pha dang 'dra'o/_/lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sogs slob/_/ces bya ba la/_ji ltar phas bu la so so'i rigs dang
[\[185a.6\]]mthun pa'i bzo slob par byed de/_rgyal rigs zhig yin na ni dgra chos la sogs pa rgyal rigs kyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa slob par byed pas na dmangs rigs pa sogs pa yang so so'i bzo slob par byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can la
[\[185a.7\]]lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gsum slob par byed pas na pha dang 'dra'o/_/rnam par grol ba sbyor ba'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar phas chung ma'i bde ba dang dga' ba bus myong bar bya ba'i
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]phyir/_bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i mna' ma len par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang dga' ba sems can gyis myong bar bya ba'i phyir/_rnam par grol ba'i gnas su sems can rnams 'jog cing der sbyor
[\[185b.2\]]bar byed pas pha dang 'dra'o/_/sangs rgyas la ni gsol ba 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar phas bu de'i bu'i srog dang srid la phan par 'gyur ba'i grogs po dam pa dag la bu 'doms shing gtod par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sems can
[\[185b.3\]]thams cad la phan par bya ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing bzhugs su gsol bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs te de bas na pha dang 'dra'o/_/sgrib pa de dag rnam par spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar phas
[\[185b.4\]]bdag la bu lon yod pa'i snam bu la khrin dang gnyer du mi 'gyur bas snga nas sbyong bar byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams 'khor ba las 'dar mi ster cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su 'jug tu mi ster ba'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i
[\[185b.5\]]sgrib pa sbyong bar byed de de bas na pha dang 'dra'o/_/dad pa ni sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lus so sor thob par 'gyur ba'i sa bon no zhes bya ba la ji ltar pha'i khu ba bu'i lus kyi sa bon yin te/_de las bsgrub pa bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis chos so so la yang dad
[\[185b.6\]]pa'i dad pas kyang theg pa gsum du 'phags pa rnams kyi lus thob par byed pas na/_dad pa ni 'phags pa'i lus thob par byed pa'i sa bon no/_/bzo ni slob pa zhes bya ba la/_sems can rigs bzhi so so'i rigs kyi bzo slob pa dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i
[\[185b.7\]]tshul khrims la sogs pa bslab pa rnam pa gsum ni bzo'i las lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to/_rnam par grol ba ni chung ma ste zhes bya ba la mya ngan las 'das pa ni chung ma lta bu ste/_ji ltar chung mas dga' ba dang bde ba myong bar byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]las 'das pa thob na yang bde ba dang dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas na chung ma lta bu ste/_bde ba ni lus la phan pa'o/_/dga' ba ni sems la phan pa'o/_/sgrib pa ni bu lon no zhes bya ba la/_ji srid du bu lon chags pa yod pas de srid du mi bde ba yod pa de
[\[186a.2\]]bzhin du ji srid du sgrib pa gnyis ma spangs pa de srid du sems can rnams 'khor ba las mi 'da' zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas mi thob pas na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis ni bu lon lta bu'o/_/las lnga dag gis sems can gyi/_/rgyal sras rtsa lag 'dra ba'o/_/
[\[186a.3\]]zhes bya ba la dper na nye dus nye du rnams la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag lta bur gyur pa'o/_/
[\[186a.4\]]de la rtsa lag rnams rtsa lag la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa ni gsang thub par byed pa dang /_nyes par byed pa la smod par byed pa dang /_legs par byed pa la stod par byed pa dang /_bya ba rnams rab tu ston par byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gnas las zlog par
[\[186a.5\]]byed pa'o/_/gang yang bstan par mi rigs par/_/sems can rnams la ston par byed/_/ces bya ba la ji ltar nye du rnams kyis nye du'i lus dang srog la gnod par 'gyur ba'i gsang ba dag gzhan la mi sgrogs shing sbed par byed pa dang /_nye dus gsang ba'i tshig smras te gzhan
[\[186a.6\]]pa'i rnams thub par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thos pa nyung ngu dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos zab mo dag mi ston cing gsang bar byed de/_de dag la zab mo bstan na skrag par 'gyur ba'i phyir
[\[186a.7\]]ro/_/bslabs las nyams pa smod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la 'di ltar nye dus lus dang srog la gnod par 'gyur ba'i las ngan pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa byas na khyed kyis ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes smod par byed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis lhag pa'i tshul
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]khrims kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa nyams pa rnams la ma legs so zhes smod par byed do/_/de bzhin phun sum tshogs la bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar nye dus nye du dag lus dang srog la phan par 'gyur
[\[186b.2\]]ba'i las legs pa zhig byas nas las 'di lta bu dag byas pa legs so zhes stod par byed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang sems dang shes rab phun sum tshogs par 'gyur na legs so zhes stod par byed do/_/lung ston par byed ces bya ba la
[\[186b.3\]]ji ltar gnyen rnams gnyen gyi phyi dang nang gi bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed cing ston par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_sems can sa dang po la sogs par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bklag pa dang /_bsam gtan bsgom pa la sogs pa'i man
[\[186b.4\]]ngag sbyin par byed do/_/bdud rnams kyang ni rig par byed/_/ces bya ba la ji ltar gnyen gyis gnyen rnams btson du bzung ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_rkun po dang /_me dang /_chu la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa byung na/_'jigs pa de las bzlog cing 'jigs pa'i skyabs byed pa
[\[186b.5\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa la sems g.yengs pa rnams/_'di dag ni bdud kyi las yin no zhes bstan cing bslabs te bdud kyi las yin par rig par byas nas bdud kyi las byed pa las
[\[186b.6\]]zlog par byed do/_/las lnga dag gis sems can gyi/_/rgyal sras grogs po 'dra ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs
[\[186b.7\]]par byed pas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi grogs por 'gyur ba'o/_/de la grogs pos grogs po la ji ltar na las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs she na/_'di ltar las rnam pa lnga ni grogs po la phan pa dang /_bde ba phyin ci ma log par
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]shes pa dang /_bde ba dang phan pa stobs pa dang /_mi skyo ba dang /_mi phyed pa dang /_rtag tu phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'o/_/nyon mongs rnam par byang ba las/_/bdag gi 'khrul pa med pa'i blos/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la ji
[\[187a.2\]]ltar byas na phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba phyin ci ma log par shes so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos la blo 'khrul pa med de nyon mongs pa'i phyogs la rnam par byang ba'i chos su mi 'dzin/_
[\[187a.3\]]rnam par byang ba'i chos la nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su mi 'dzin gyi nyon mongs pa la yang nyon mongs pa nyid du shes rnam par byang ba'i chos la yang rnam par byang ba'i chos nyid du shes pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa gnyis ni nyon mongs pa'i phyogs so/_/
[\[187a.4\]]'gog pa dang lam gnyis ni rnam par byang ba'i phyogs so/_/yang na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ni nyon mongs pa'i phyogs so/_/ma rig pa 'gags na 'du byed 'gag pa nas skye ba 'gags na rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dag ni rnam par byang ba'i
[\[187a.5\]]phyogs so/_/'jig rten 'byor pa ma lus dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la 'phral du srog dang srid pa bde bar 'gyur ba stobs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba la sogs
[\[187a.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la sems can 'god par byed cing de lta bu dag sbyin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'jig rten pa yang ma yin sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la nam nam zhar zhar srog dang srid la phan par 'gyur
[\[187a.7\]]ba'i phan yon stobs pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa theg pa chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog pas na phan par byed pa yin no/_/de la 'jig rten gyi phan pa dang bde ba ni
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'phral du srog dang srid la phan pa ni bde ba'o/_/yun ring srog dang srid la phan pa ni phan pa'o/_/skyo ba med cing zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs po dag grogs po la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba la skyo ba med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi phun sum
[\[187b.2\]]tshogs pa bde ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa phan pa la sems can 'god par bya ba la skyo ba cung zad kyang med do/_/mi phyed pa zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs po dag gis bdag gi grogs dang 'bye bar 'gyur ba'i phra ma smras kyang phyed par mi 'gyur
[\[187b.3\]]ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi don du dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa spyod cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la bdud la sogs pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba dang /_grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dbang du mi
[\[187b.4\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bde dang phan 'dod do/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po rnams dus thams cad du bde ba dang /_phan pa'i chos dang ldan par 'dod cing dad la sems can la yang rtag tu
[\[187b.5\]]de ltar sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus thams cad du sems can rnams phan pa dang bde ba dang ldan zhing rtag tu chos de dag dang 'grogs par 'dod do/_/'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba ste zhes bya ba la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la
[\[187b.6\]]sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams la bkod pa ni bde ba zhes bya ste/_de'i dus na 'jig rten 'jig rten gyi longs spyod kyi bde ba myong ba'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnyen po'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mya ngan
[\[187b.7\]]las 'das pa dang /_de'i lam la bkod pa la ni phan pa zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na dper na sman 'thungs na nad la phan pa bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed pas ni phan pa zhes bya'o/_/las lnga dag gis
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]sems can gyi rgyal sras bran dang 'dra ba'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar bran las rnam pa lngas jo bo la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni sems
[\[188a.2\]]can thams cad kyi bran dang 'dra'o/_/bran jo bo la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs pa'i las rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_bya ba la spro ba dang ldan pa yin/_mi slu ba yin spyo zhing brdegs kyang bzod pa yin/_'dod pa thams cad bya ba la mkhas pa yin/_thabs mkhas la khong gzo ba
[\[188a.3\]]shes pa can yin no/_/sems can yongs su smin byed la/_/thams cad du ni brtson pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar bran jo bo'i bya ba la spro ba dang ldan pa yin te skyo ba dang le lo med cing /_brtson par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyin par bya ba la bar 'ga' byed/_bar
[\[188a.4\]]'ga' mi byed pa ma yin gyi/_dus thams cad du sems can gyi don byed de skyo ba dang le lo med cing brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin no/_/yang dag 'byung bar smra ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar bran brdzun dang /_g.yo sgyu med de/_jo bo la mthong ba dang /_thos pa la sogs pa drang por
[\[188a.5\]]smra zhing mi slu ba yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung gnyis la ni nyon mongs pa'i phyogs yin par ma nor bar ston/_'gog pa dang lam gnyis la ni rnam par byang ba'i phyogs gnyis ka ma nor bar ston cing nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[188a.6\]]las dang /_sdug bsngal las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos ma nor bar smra zhing ston pas na bran dang 'dra ba'o/_/log par byed la bzod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar bran jo bos tshig drag pos spyo zhing brdegs kyang sdug bsngal bzod cing nyams su len la jo bo mi gtong ba de bzhin
[\[188a.7\]]du/_sems can rnams kyis lus dang ngag gi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa dang /_phan btags kyang slar log par gnod pa nyams su len cing sems can yongs su mi gtong bas na bran lta bu'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa gnyis gtong
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]ba/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar bran 'dod pa thams cad bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_jo bo gang dang gang dgos pa'i rnam pa yid bzhin du sbyor zhing stobs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'jig
[\[188b.2\]]rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gtong zhing stobs par byed pas na bran dang 'dra'o/_/yang na phun sum tshogs pa gnyis gtong ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/de dag gi ni thabs la mkhas/_/zhes bya ba
[\[188b.3\]]la ji ltar bran thabs la khong gzo bas shes pa can yin te/_jo bo'i las su bya ba ci dang ci bya ba rnams/_myur du 'grub par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das
[\[188b.4\]]pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i thabs ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum
[\[188b.5\]]cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'o/_/las lnga dag gis sems can gyi/_/rgyas sras slob dpon 'dra ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar las rnam pa lngas slob dpon gyis slob ma la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_las rnam pa lngas sems
[\[188b.6\]]can la phan 'dogs par byed do/_/slob dpon gyi las rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_bdag nyid shin tu bslab pa dang /_thams cad slob par byed pa dang /_myur du slob par byed pa dang /_/de'i rang bzhin can gyi phyir mdangs can dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[188b.7\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya ba la 'di ltar slob dpon bdag nyid shin tu bslabs pa yin te/_bshad par bya ba dang /_shes par bya ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par shes pa dang /_gdod phan 'dogs par byas par slob dpon yin pa de bzhin du/_byang chub
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]sems dpa' sa brgyad thob pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas shes par bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang /_spang bar ba ba'i chos rnams la lhun gyis grub par spyod pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pas na/_
[\[189a.2\]]slob dpon shin tu bslab pa dang 'dra ba yin no/_/gang 'dod pa/_theg pa thams cad ston pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar slob dpon thams cad slob par byed de/_kha cig slob kha cig mi slob pa ma yin gyi/_bdag ci shes pa rnams slob ma la ma lus par slob par byed pa
[\[189a.3\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang /_sems can mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'dod pa rnams la theg pa 'ga' ston pa ma yin gyi/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad ma lus par ston cing /_slob par
[\[189a.4\]]byed pas na/_slob dpon lta bu'o/_/rnal 'byor grub par sbyor ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon sgra'i gtsug lag dang /_rgyu'i gtsug lag la sogs pa 'chad pa/_slob ma nye g.yog tu bkol ba'i phyir/_slob ma de dag myur du lobs par mi
[\[189a.5\]]byed kyi/_dus ring pos lobs par byed do/_/slob dpon yang dag pa dag ni de lta ma yin te/_slob ma bslab pa'i rnams bslab ba'i las dag myur du lobs par byed pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi sgra ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa la bya ste/_sems can rnams kyis
[\[189a.6\]]zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin myur du 'grub par 'gyur bar sbyor bar byed pas na/_slob dpon lta bu yin no/_/mdangs can dang ni zhes bya ba la ji ltar slob dpon dag slob ma la byams pa'i sems yin pas/_bzhin khro gnyer med cing /_rtag tu
[\[189a.7\]]yang 'dzum pa dang tshig 'jam por smra ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas khro gnyer med cing bzhin mdangs can ston pa la/_tshig 'jam pos smra bas na slob dpon lta bu'o/_/phyir bya ba dang /_rnam par
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]smin pa re ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_ji ltar slob dpon slob ma la chos ston cing 'chad pa la sogs pa byed pa yang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i sems zang zing can gyis ston pa ma yin gyi/_slob ma'i sdug bsngal med par bya'o snyam pa'i sems snying rje dang
[\[189b.2\]]ldan pas ston pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba byed pa yang /_tshe 'di la phan btags pa'i lan la re ba med pa dang /_tshe phyi ma rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la re ba med pas phan 'dogs par byed de/_de bas na slob
[\[189b.3\]]dpon dang 'dra'o/_/las lnga dag gis sems can gyi/_/rgyal sras mkhan po 'dra ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar mkhan pos slob ma rnams la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can
[\[189b.4\]]la phan 'dogs par byed pas na byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi mkhan po lta bu yin no/_/mkhan po las rnam pa lngas slob ma la phan 'dogs pa'i las rnam pa gang zhe na/_rab tu 'byung bar byed pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang
[\[189b.5\]]nyes pa yongs su spong ba ston par byed pa dang /_zang zing gis sdud pa dang /_chos kyis sdud pa'o/_/sems can don la rab brtson pa/_/tshogs ni rdzogs par byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar mkhan pos slob ma khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/_
[\[189b.6\]]dge sbyong gi bslab pa byin nas/_rab tu 'byin par byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa rnams kyang /_sems can bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma rdzogs pa rnams/_tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'byin par byed
[\[189b.7\]]pas na mkhan po lta bu'o/_/tshogs bsags grol bar byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar mkhan pos slob ma rab tu byung nas/_bslab pa nyis brgya lnga bcu byin te/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]sems can tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dag rnam par grol ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin par byed pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mkhan po lta bu'o/_/mi mthun phyogs ni nyams par byed/_/ces bya ba la ji ltar mkhan
[\[190a.2\]]pos slob ma la/_phas pham pa dang ltung ba dang nyes byas la sogs pa gang dang gang yin pa ston cing /_nyes pa la 'jug pa las zlog cing spong bar byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams la rnam par grol ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thob
[\[190a.3\]]par bya ba la bgegs su gyur pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyams shing spong bar byed pas na mkhan po lta bu'o/_/'jig rten phun sum tshogs sna tshogs/_/zhes bya ba la ji ltar mkhan pos slob ma la/_chos gos dang lhung bzed la sogs
[\[190a.4\]]pa'i yo byad 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can thams cad brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa thob par byed pas mkhan po lta bu'o/_/
[\[190a.5\]]'jig rten ma yin sbyor bar byed/_/ces bya ba la ji ltar mkhan pos slob ma la chos bstan pa'i sgo nas kyang phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_sems can 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa theg pa gsum gyi
[\[190a.6\]]lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par byed pas na mkhan po lta bu'o/_/drin gzo ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa la sems can la phan btags na phan btags pa'i sems
[\[190a.7\]]can rnams byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas na/_sems can la drin du gzo bar byed de/_de ltar na sems can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gnyi ga phan tshun gcig la gcig drin du gzo bar byed
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/longs spyod la ni ma chags shing /_/zhes bya ba la sems can bza' ba dang /_bgo ba la sogs pa'i yo byad kyis phongs pa rnams la/_yo byad thams cad byin te longs spyod dang ldan par byas na sems can/_
[\[190b.2\]]de dag byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sems can longs spyod dang ldan pa/_de dag gis longs spyod dang ldan pa dang /_ser sna spangs nas sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa na/_sems can 'di dag gis
[\[190b.3\]]phan btags pa zhes sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' drin du gzo bar byed do/_/tshul khrims kyang ni ral ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims la bkod na/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo
[\[190b.4\]]bar byed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims la bkod pa'i sems can de dag gis tshul khrims nyams par ma byas te/_phas pham pa la bag bya ste/_bsrung ba bzhin du nyes byas la sogs pa nyes pa phra mo rnams
[\[190b.5\]]la yang /_bag byas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag la drin du gzo bar byed do/_/drin du gzo ba dang ldan pa ste zhes bya ba la sems can rnams kyis lus dang ngag gi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa
[\[190b.6\]]dang ldan pa des/_sems can la slar gnod pa mi byed pa rnams la/_slar phan 'dogs par byed de/_des na sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag la gnod pa ma byas so zhes byang chub sems dpa' drin du gzo bar byed la/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[190b.7\]]bzod pa la dga' bas sems can de dag kyang bzod pa la gnas par gyur na/_sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yang drin du gzo bar byed do/_/bsgrub pa la yang sbyor ba'o/_/zhes pa la/_sems can rnams byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus bsgrub pa
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]dang /_bsam gtan bsgrub pa dang /_shes rab bsgrub pa la bkod na/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo bar byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bkod pa ltar/_/sems can brtson 'grus bsgrub pa
[\[191a.2\]]dang /_bsam gtan bsgrub pa dang /_shes rab bsgrub pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag la drin du gzo bar byed do/_/pha rol phyin pa drug la ni/_/de ltar lus can sgrub par byed/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' la/_/phyir yang drin du gzo
[\[191a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod na/_sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo ba byed do/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems can bkod de/_lus can sems
[\[191a.4\]]can rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed na/_'di dag gis bdag la phan btags so zhes de dag la byang chub sems dpa' drin du gzo bar byed do/_/de bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo ba de ltar ro zhes bya ba la sems can
[\[191a.5\]]rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la bkod na/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpas bdag cag la phan btags so zhes byang chub sems dpa' la drin du gzo bar byed pa de bzhin du/_sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed na yang /_sems can
[\[191a.6\]]'di dag gis bdag la phan btags so zhes sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' slar drin du gzo bar byed do/_/tshul khrims la'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshul khrims la bkod na/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' la
[\[191a.7\]]drin du gzo bar byed pa ltar/_sems can de dag tshul khrims la gnas na yang /_sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' drin du gzo bar byed do/_/bzod pa la dga' ba/_byang chub sems dpas phan pa byas pa la drin du gzo ba'i phyir/_drin du gzo
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]ba dang ldan pa ni bzod pa'o zhes bya ba la sems can gyis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byas kyang /_sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa mi byed pas gnod pa byas pa'i sems can des byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la dga' ba shes nas/_
[\[191b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' phan btags pa'i sems can de la phan pa byas la drin du gzo ba'i phyir/_drin du gzo ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la dag pa'i sems dang mthun par bzod pa la gnas par byed na/_sems can de la byang chub
[\[191b.3\]]sems dpa' drin du gzo bar byed do/_/gang gis gang du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba la gang gis sgrub par byed ce na/_brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed do/_/gang la sgrub par byed ce na/_bsam gtan dang shes rab la sgrub par byed do/_/re ba rnam par
[\[191b.4\]]dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba de ltar sems can la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnas rnam pa lnga ji ltar thob par bya zhe na re ba dang smon pa skye ste/_de bstan pa la tshigs su bcad pa gcig brtsams so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[191b.5\]]'phel ba dang ni zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug ji ltar 'phel bar 'gyur zhes re zhing 'dod de/_'di ni re ba'i gnas rnam pa gcig go/_/'bri bar
[\[191b.6\]]'dod ces bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs/_ser sna nas 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi bar dag rtag tu ji ltar 'phri zhing nyams par 'gyur zhes re zhing 'dod de/_'di ni re zhing 'dod pa'i gnas rnam pa gnyis
[\[191b.7\]]so/_/sems can rnams ni smin pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rtag tu dad pa ma skyes pa rnams ni dad pa skyed/_dad pa skyes pa rnams ni dge ba la 'god/_dge ba la bkod pa rnams ni yongs su smin par bya'o zhes re zhing 'dod
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]de/_'di ni re ba'i gnas rnam pa gsum mo/_/sa la khyad par 'gro ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rtag tu sa dang po thob nas/_sa gnyis pa ji ltar thob par bya zhes 'dod pa nas/_sa dgu pa thob na sa bcu pa ji ltar
[\[192a.2\]]thob par bya zhes 'dod cing re ste/_'di ni re ba'i gnas rnam pa bzhi pa'o/_/rtag tu bla med byang chub la'o/_/zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus thams cad du sa bcu las 'das nas/_sangs rgyas ji ltar thob par bya zhes 'dod de/_'di ni re ba'i
[\[192a.3\]]gnas rnam pa lnga pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams re zhing 'dod na yang gnas lnga po de dag la re zhing 'dod pa skye ste/_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'am/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la ni re ba cung zad kyang mi
[\[192a.4\]]skye'o/_/sbyor ba chud mi za ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la nyan thos dag gis sbyor ba byas pa nas/_bdag gi don du zhus pas sems can gyi don med pa'i phyir chud zos pa dang /_'jig rten pa dag gi sbyor ba ni phal cher 'bras bu med par 'gyur
[\[192a.5\]]bas chud zos pa yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' re ba phyin ci ma log cing re ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas las su ji dang ji byas pa rnams de bzhin du 'bras bu grub cing 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur na sbyor ba chud mi za ba zhes bya ste/_de'ang sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi chud mi za'o/_/
[\[192a.6\]]'jigs pa spangs dang zhes bya ba la gal te theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba la skrag na ni byang chub sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la sbyor ba las chud zos pa yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zab cing rgya che ba'i chos la bdag nyid kyang skrag cing 'jigs pa
[\[192a.7\]]med pa/_sems can rnams theg pa chen po'i don la/_skrag cing 'jigs pa yang sel bar byed pas na/_sbyor ba chud mi za ba zhes bya ste/_'di ni chud mi za ba rnam pa gcig go/_/de la chos dang gang zag bdag med pa ni zab pa'o/_/sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]rgya che ba'o/_/bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang sems can dag 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed dam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i sems bskyed na ni sbyor ba chud zos
[\[192b.2\]]pa yin na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar mi mdzad kyi/_bdag dang sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pas na/_byang chub kyi sems las ma nyams pa'i phyir sbyor ba chud ma zos te/_'di ni chud ma zos pa rnam pa gnyis pa'o/_/the tshom
[\[192b.3\]]yang ni gcod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la gal te sems can bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams theg pa chen po'i chos la the tshom bcad na ni sems can de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las log par 'gyur ba chud za ba yin na/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams
[\[192b.4\]]theg pa chen po'i chos la the tshom za ba'i the tshom gcod par byed pas na byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog pa'i phyir sbyor ba chud mi za ste/_'di ni chud mi za ba rnam pa gsum pa'o/_/bsgrub pa dag ni gdams ngag rnams/_/rgyal sras rtag tu chud mi za/_/zhes bya ba la gal te byang chub
[\[192b.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems kyis/_sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag bstan pa bzhin du/_bdag nyid kyang mi bsgrub cing /_sems can la yang bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag mi ston na sbyor ba chud zos pa yin na/_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[192b.6\]]bdag nyid kyang yang dag pa'i gdams ngag dang man ngag bzhin du sgrub par byed pa yin la/_sems can la yang yang dag pa'i gdams ngag dang man ngag ston par byed pas sbyor ba chud mi za ste/_'di ni chud mi za ba rnam pa bzhi pa ste/_'di ni chud mi za ba gong du bshad pa'i
[\[192b.7\]]chos bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu chud mi za ba'i chos zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so zhes bya ba la sbyor ba ni las su byed pa la bya ste/_de ltar chud mi za ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas las su byed pa rnams ma nor bar byed par 'gyur te/_de bas na las su byed pa la ma nor bar byed pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to/_/sbyin pa la ni re ba med/_/ces bya ba la brel ba dang phongs pa rnams
[\[193a.2\]]la chos dang zang zing dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa byas kyang /_tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa'i lan yang re ba med la/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang longs spyod chen po'i rnam par smin pa la re ba med par gtong ste/_de ltar gtod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
[\[193a.3\]]par sbyor ba'o/_/tshul khrims sred par 'dod pa med/_/ces bya ba la tshul khrims bsrungs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims bsrung ba ni srid pa'i bde ba lha dang mi'i gnas thob par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba ma yin
[\[193a.4\]]gyi/_bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ste/_'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'o/_/thams cad du ni bzod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la lus kyi sgo nas mi rdeg pa dang ngag gi sgo nas tshig rtsub po tsam mi 'byin kyang sems la
[\[193a.5\]]khong khro ba yod na/_thams cad du bzod pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang ngag gi gnod pa mi byed pa bzhin du yid la yang khong khro ba med pas na/_thams cad du bzod pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'o/_/
[\[193a.6\]]brtson 'grus dge ba thams cad 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa 'ga' tsam bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/_theg pa 'ga' tsam gyi chos la brtson 'grus rtsam pa ni dge ba thams cad 'byung ba'i brtson 'grus zhes mi bya'i/_byang chub sems
[\[193a.7\]]dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_theg pa gsum char gyi chos la yang brtson 'grus rtsom pas na/_dge ba thams cad 'byung ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/_'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'o/_/de bzhin gzugs
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]med ma yin bsam gtan dang /_/zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan bsgom pa ni bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur bar bsgom gyi gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[193b.2\]]bsam gtan mi bsgom ste/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtha' med pa'i phyir te/_de lta bu'i bsam gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[193b.3\]]la yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/shes rab thabs dang ldan na ni/_/zhes bya ba la thabs yod la shes rab med pa dang shes rab yod pa la thabs med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'ching ba yin pas/_chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes pa'i shes rab de sems can
[\[193b.4\]]yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan na/_thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i shes rab yin te/_de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rnams la/_/bstan pa
[\[193b.5\]]rnams kyis yang dag sbyor/_/zhes bya ba la gong du bshad pa lta bur pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor na bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la yang dag pa dang ma nor bar sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa las
[\[193b.6\]]kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gong du bshad pa lta bur pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par sbyor ba yin par/_'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang bshad de/_ji skad du gsungs she na/_rnam par smin
[\[193b.7\]]pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa dang /_srid pa'i skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i bzod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyis
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ma gos pa'i bsam gtan dang thabs la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i shes rab dang zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/nyams pa dang khyad par gyi phyogs kyi chos rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su
[\[194a.2\]]bcad pa rnam pa gnyis so zhes bya ba la chos gang gnas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug las nyams par 'gyur ba'i nyams pa'i phyogs kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/chos gang la gnas na pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'phel zhing 'bogs par 'gyur ba'i chos la ni khyad par gyi
[\[194a.3\]]phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni nyams shing 'bri bar 'gyur la/_de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos rnams ni zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du 'phel bar 'gyur te/_
[\[194a.4\]]de bas na nyams pa dang 'phel bar 'gyur ba tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to/_/longs spyod chags dang zhes bya ba la gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chags pa ni longs spyod la chags pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' longs
[\[194a.5\]]spyod la chags na sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar mi nus pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/ral bar bcas zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpas bslab tshig phra mo dag kyang nyams par byas na/_des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[194a.6\]]las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/nga rgyal dang ni zhes bya ba la/_mkhan po dang slob dpon dang gang zag yon tan can la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gus pa med pa ni nga rgyal dang bcas pa zhes bya ste/_yod pa'i rnams la bzod par mi nus mi srid pa srid pas nga rgyal gyis
[\[194a.7\]]ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/nyams rangs dang zhes bya ba la nyal ba dang 'phros pa la sogs pa'i bde ba tsam la chags pa ni nyams rangs zhes bya ste/_de ltar nyams rangs yod na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug tu mi btub pas
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/myong dang zhes bya ba la myang ba ni bsam gtan gyi ro la chags pa ste/_bsam gtan gyi ro myongs na bsam gtan las nyams par 'gyur bas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur ba'i
[\[194b.2\]]rgyu'o/_/rnam par rtog pa ni zhes bya ba la bdag dang sems can dang /_rdzas kyi dngos po la sogs pa yod par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar brtags na rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab mi 'byung bas/_shes rab las nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu'o/_/
[\[194b.3\]]de rnams kyi ni gnyen po la/_/gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/de dag las ni bzlog pas na/_/khyad par phyogs chos shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la de rnams kyi sgras ni gong du bshad pa'i longs spyod la chags pa nas/_rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i nyams par
[\[194b.4\]]gyur pa'i rgyu drug la bya ste/_rgyu drug po de'i gnyen po ni longs spyod la ma chags pa dang /_tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_rang nyams med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi ro la mi myang ba dang /_bdag dang sems can dang /_chos rnams la yod par mi rigs
[\[194b.5\]]pa ste/_gnyen po'i chos de drug la gnas pa ni nag po'i chos las bzlog ste/_dkar po'i phyogs la gnas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'bogs shing khyad par du 'gro ba'i chos yin no zhes bya ba'i don
[\[194b.6\]]to/_/yon tan gyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa drug ste/_gcig rtsa ba drug pa'o zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa drug las nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i rgyur bshad de/_de la byang chub sems
[\[194b.7\]]dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu la gnas na ni yon tan gyi gzugs brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya ba ste/_de la yang dag pa'i yon tan med kyi/_yon tan sgyu ma tsam la gnas pa'o/_/gal te pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu la gnas na ni byang chub sems
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dpa' de yang dag pa'i yon tan la gnas pa zhes bya ste/_de bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom mo/_/de la tshigs su bcad pa dang po ni rtsa ba drug pa'o/_/stobs pa dang zhes bya ba la phyi dang nang gi sbyin no zhes tshig gis stobs par byed pa tsam
[\[195a.2\]]du zad kyi/_phyi nang gi dngos po gtong ba'i sbyin pa sgrub pa med pa na sbyin pa yang dag pa ma yin gyi/_sbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya ste/_tshul 'chos dang zhes bya ba phas pham pa dang ltung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa ni mi srung zhing nyes pa rgyun du 'byung la/_
[\[195a.3\]]spyod lam tsam gyi sgo nas tshul 'chos pa la yon tan dang 'dra bar ston pa ni tshul khrims kyi gzugs brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag 'jam pa dag ston pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sems la sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang spangs pa'i byams pa med pa la/_
[\[195a.4\]]rtag tu sems can la gsod par bya ba'i zhe sdang dang /_sems ldan zhing tshig gi sgo nas 'jam zhing snyan pa tsam smra ba ni bzod pa'i gzugs brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/glo bur 'jug pa de bzhin te/_/zhes bya ba la rgyun du dge ba la brtson 'grus byed pa ni med kyi skye bo mang
[\[195a.5\]]po'i nang du brtson 'grus che ba dang phul 'phral la glo bur du brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni brtson 'grus kyi gzugs brnyan la gnas pa'o/_/lus dang ngag yid de bzhin ni/_/zhes bya ba ni lus zhi ste shing drung dang brag la sogs pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang /_ngag
[\[195a.6\]]zhi ste smra ba mang po mi smra bar byed kyang sems la rgod pa dang g.yeng ba rnam pa sna tshogs rgyun du 'byung ste/_de ni bsam gtan gyi gzugs brnyan la gnas pa'o/_/tshig snyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyi chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i
[\[195a.7\]]mtshan nyid la shes pa ni med kyi/_'jig rten gyi sgra'i gtsug lag dang rgyu'i gtsug lag shes shing smra ba'i dus na tshig 'brel ba tsam du smra bar zad kyi don gang la bya gtol med na shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bsgrub pa rab tu spangs pa ste/_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]yang dag ma yin par yang bshad/_/ces bya ba la stobs pa tsam la gnas nas tshig snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par zad kyi sbyin pa sgrub pa nas chos kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub pa med na/_byang chub sems dpa' de yang dag pa'i byang chub
[\[195b.2\]]sems dpa' ma yin par bshad de/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad do/_/bzlog pa rab tu sbyor ba ni/_/yang dag par ni de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la gong du bshad pa'i stobs pa nas tshig snyan pa phun
[\[195b.3\]]sum tshogs pa spyod pa las bzlog ste/_sbyin pa la sogs pa nas chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab la spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa' de yang dag pa'i yon tan la gnas par bshad do/_/'dul ba rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_
[\[195b.4\]]de ltar yang dag pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des ni sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyogs rnams 'dul bar byed par nus te/_de bas na 'dul ba rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa
[\[195b.5\]]gcig gis bstan to/_/de'ang mdor na/_gang gis 'dul ba dang /_sa gang la gnas pa na 'dul ba dang /_chos gang bsgrubs pas 'dul ba dang /_gang gis 'dul ba dang /_gang 'dul bas 'dul ba rnam par dbye ba bstan to/_/blo ldan zhes bya ba las kun ni sa
[\[195b.6\]]bcu kun la bya ste/_sa gang la gnas pa'i tshe 'dul zhe na/_sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshe 'dul lo/_/sbyin pa la sogs nyer bsgrubs pas/_/zhes bya ba la chos gang bsgrubs she na/_sa bcu rnams su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams bsgrubs pas 'dul lo/_/sems can rnams kyis zhes bya ba la su
[\[195b.7\]]yis 'dul zhe na/_sems can rnams kyis 'dul lo/_/mi mthun phyogs rnams drug ni 'dul bar byed/_/ces bya ba la ci zhig 'dul zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna nas 'chal ba'i shes rab
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]kyi bar dag yod par 'dul te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa bsgrubs pas ni sems can gyi ser sna 'dul lo/_/tshul khrims bsgrubs pas ni sems can gyi ngan pa'i ngang tshul 'dul lo/_/bzod pa bsgrubs pas ni khong khro ba 'dul lo/_brtson 'grus bsgrubs pas ni sems can gyi le lo
[\[196a.2\]]'dul lo/_/bsam gtan bsgrubs pas ni sems can gyi sems g.yeng ba 'dul lo/_/shes rab bsgrubs pas ni sems can gyi 'chal ba'i shes rab 'dul lo/_/lung bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid
[\[196a.3\]]kyang yang dag pa'i yon tan la gnas shing sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa 'dul ba la zhugs pa de bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bsgom pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i gnas/_sa
[\[196a.4\]]brgyad pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur te/_de bas na lung du bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bstan to/_/blo ldan lung bstan rnam gnyis te/_/gang zag dus kyi bye brag gis/_/zhes bya ba la blo dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa'i
[\[196a.5\]]byang chub tu lung bstan pa rnam pa gnyis yod de/_gang zag gi bye brag gis lung bstan pa dang /_dus kyi bye brag gis lung bstan pa'o/_/de la gang zag gi bye brag gis bstan pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/_rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag lung bstan pa dang /_byang chub tu
[\[196a.6\]]sems bskyed pa'i gang zag lung bstan pa dang /_mngon du gyur pa'i gang zag lung bstan pa dang /_mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa'i gang zag lung bstan pa'o/_/de la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag lung bstan pa ni sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rigs dang sa
[\[196a.7\]]bon yod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan ma snang na gang zag de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi theg pa chen po'i rigs yod kyang rig pa'i mtshan ma med pa rnams ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bar lung mi ston te/_sems bskyed pa'i lung bstan pa rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag las bdag dang sems can phan par 'dod pa'i phyir dad pa dang /_mos pa chen po'i shugs kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_
[\[196b.2\]]de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gang zag 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/mngon sum du 'gyur bar lung bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa'i 'og tu gang zag de 'dus na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa gang
[\[196b.3\]]zag 'di mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'o/_/mngon sum ma yin pa la lung bstan pa ni gang zag lung ston par 'os pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa'i 'khor du tshogs pa ni ma yin gyi/_de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan la gnas
[\[196b.4\]]pa'am/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'byung ba ste/_de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na gnas pa'i gang zag 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa na gang zag 'di lta bu dag
[\[196b.5\]]'byung ste/_de mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa ste/_dper na A tsAr+ya nA ga rdzun lung bstan pa lta bu'o/_/dus kyi bye brag gis lung ston pa la rnam pa gnyis te/_dus dpag tu yod par lung ston pa dang dus dpag tu med par lung ston par lo dang
[\[196b.6\]]zla ba dang bskal pa grangs chad par byas nas lung ston pa ste/_bskal pa brgya zhe'am stong zhe'am bskal pa bye ba stong ji snyed cig na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes ston pa'o/_/dus dpag tu med par lung ston pa ni bskal pa'i grangs chad pa
[\[196b.7\]]med de/_'di ltar gang zag 'di nam zhig na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa'o/_/byang chub pa dang lung bstan dang /_/zhes bya ba la yang lung bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te/_byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /_lung bstan pa'i lung bstan pa'o/_/de la byang
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]chub tu lung bstan pa ni ma 'ongs pa na/_sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa ste/_dper na shAkya thub pas ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa'o/_/lung ston
[\[197a.2\]]pa'i lung bstan pa ni nam zhig na gang zag gang 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis lung mi ston gyi ma 'ongs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des gang zag che ge mo zhig bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
[\[197a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chen por shin tu bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_lung bstan pa rnam pa gzhan yang yod de/_gang zhe na/_gang chen por lung bstan pa'o/_/de la chen por lung bstan pa ni sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
[\[197a.4\]]lung bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/sa brgyad pa lung bstan pa la/_ci'i phyir chen por lung bstan pa zhes bya zhe na/_de'i phyir/_mi skye bzod pa thob pa dang /_/nga dang spyod pa spangs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal sras dang /_/gcig gis dngos su gyur pa'i phyir
[\[197a.5\]]ro/_/zhes bya ba smos te sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas/_nga spangs pa ste/_rtsol ba dang 'bad pa spangs pa dang /_spyod pa spangs pa ste/_mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i spyod pa spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_phrin las gcig tu gyur
[\[197a.6\]]pa las sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_phrin las gcig cing rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa brnyes pa rang bzhin gcig pas na/_sa brgyad pa lung bstan pa ni chen por lung bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/lung bstan pa'i rnam
[\[197a.7\]]grangs gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir/_zhing dang dus dang ming dag dang /_/de yang bskal pa'i ming dag dang /_/g.yog dang rjes su 'jug pa dang /_/dam chos rnams su de 'dod do/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhe'am/_che ge mo
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]zhig tu sangs rgyas kyi mtshan snang ba mtha' yas zhe'am che ge mo zhig dus 'di srid cig 'das nas/_bskal pa'i ming skar ma can zhe'am/_che ge mo zhig tu nyan thos kyi g.yog 'di snyed cig dang /_de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig 'khor du
[\[197b.2\]]'gyur zhing de mngon par sangs rgyas te bshad pa'i chos rnams kyang bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'o/_/yang byang chub tu lung ston pa yin zhes bya ba la yang bstan pa gnyis te/_byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /_lung bstan pa'i lung
[\[197b.3\]]bstan pa'o/_/de la byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni ma 'ongs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di zhes bya bas/_dus che ge mo zhig na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[197b.4\]]lung bstan pa'i lung bstan pa ni gang zag gang zhig lung ston na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyis de la lung mi ston gyi nam zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig 'di srid cig na/_'byung bar 'gyur te des gang zag che ge mo zhig bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
[\[197b.5\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa ni lung ston pa'i lung ston pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang lung bstan pa chen po ni sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa'i phyir/_bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la lung bstan pa'i grangs su gzhan yang yod de/_
[\[197b.6\]]gang zhe na/_lung bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'o/_/de las brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir/_de'i tshe lung bstan pa zhes bya zhe na/_de'i tshe mi skye
[\[197b.7\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir/_sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdag nyid gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar shes pas bdag 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la yang lung ston cing de bzhin gshegs
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pa rnams kyis kyang lung ston par mdzad pas na/_lung ston pa zhes bya'o/_/sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa ji ltar na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ce na de'i phyir/_nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir dang /_mtshan ma la spyod pa spangs pa'i phyir dang /_de dang bdag gi
[\[198a.2\]]rgyud tha dad pa med par ma mthong bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i tshe/_rtsol ba dang 'bad pa thams cad spangs pas na nga rgyal spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos mang po la mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs su yid la byed pa
[\[198a.3\]]spangs pas na/_mtshan ma la spyod pa spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_bdag nyid du rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa thob pa mi 'dra ba med de/_rgyud tha dad pa med par
[\[198a.4\]]mthong bas/_de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob cing bdag 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag la bdag lung ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pas ni/_lung ston pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/nges par 'gyur ba
[\[198a.5\]]rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba drug pa ste/_zhes bya ba la/_gong du bshad pa lta bur lung bstan pa la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' de pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa yang de dag gi 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi bla na
[\[198a.6\]]med pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pa'i phyir sgrub mod kyi/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa drug kyang gdon mi za ba dang /_nges par 'thob par 'gyur te/_de bas na nges par 'gyur ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba drug pa gcig gis bstan to/_/blo
[\[198a.7\]]ldan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/skye dang skye med nges par 'gyur/_/rtag tu sgom par byed pa dang /_/mnyam par gzhag las mi nyams dang /_/bya ba 'grub dang lhun gyis 'grub/_/kun du bzod pa thob pa la/_/zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]drug sgrub pa na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'bras bu rnam pa drug nges par 'thob par 'gyur te/_'bras bu nges par thob pa rnam pa drug ni phun sum tshogs pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_skye ba nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_mi skye ba nges par 'thob par
[\[198b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu bsgom pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa las mi nyams pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bya ba bsgrub pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lhun gyis grub cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nges par 'thob par
[\[198b.3\]]'gyur ba'o/_/rtag tu rgya chen po'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas na phun sum tshogs pa nges par thob par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' gang nas gang du skyes pa ste de dag thams
[\[198b.4\]]cad du brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod 'thob par gdon mi za ba'i phyir ro/_/rtag tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/_skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas ni skye ba nges
[\[198b.5\]]par 'thob par 'gyur te/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan pa bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar skye ba lta bu ni ma yin gyi/_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i gnas de dang /_de dag tu ji dgar skye bar 'gyur bar
[\[198b.6\]]gdon mi za ba'i phyir ro/_/rtag tu 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi skyo ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas ni mi skyo ba'i nges pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzod pa la gnas pa rnams dus thams cad du yang bdag dang /_sems can gyi
[\[198b.7\]]don du zhugs pa na grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis skyo ba med pa'i sems thob par gdon mi za ba'i phyir ro/_/rtag tu bsgom pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas/_rtag tu bsgom pa
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]nges par thob par 'gyur te/_brtson 'grus kyi mthus/_byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes gar skyes kyang de dag thams cad du 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba bsgom pa la rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pa gdon mi za ba 'thob par
[\[199a.2\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rtag tu ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams pa dang /_sems can bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas ni mnyam par gzhag pa las mi nyams pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bya ba bsgrub pa
[\[199a.3\]]nges par 'thob par 'gyur te/_ji lta zhe na bsam gtan bsgrubs pa'i mthus/_byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs gar skyes gar skyes kyang bsam gtan la gnas nas nams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur bar gdon mi za ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi mthus/_
[\[199a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can gyi don bsgrub par gdon mi za bar rnam par nges par rnam pa gnyis ni bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yin par bsdu'o/_/kun du rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la shes
[\[199a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrubs pas ni lhun gyis grub par mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par nges par 'gyur te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab bsgoms pa'i mthus sa brgyad pa thob pa dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la gnas pa la
