[\[220a.6\]]pa spyod pa'i sa bzhi la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhe bya ste/_mos pa spyod pa'i sa bzhi la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni mos pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/ji lta'i phyir mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya zhe na/_de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro
[\[220a.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid mngon sum du ma byas kyi/_chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid la dad cing yid ches pa tsam yod pa'i phyir ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa gzhan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gnyis pa ni/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sa dang
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/_de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi
[\[220b.2\]]don phun sum tshogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa lhag pa zhes bya ba la/_mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma dang ni zhes bya ba la/_/sa gnyis pa yan chad sa drug pa man chad la gnas pa'i
[\[220b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhes bya zhe na/_sa gnyis pa la ni 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa/_'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/_'di ni theg pa chen po'o zhes theg pa la rnam pa sna tshogs
[\[220b.4\]]su 'byed pa'i mtshan ma spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/sa gsum pa la ni lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mtshan ma spangs so/_/sa bzhi pa la ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa la gnod pa'i rnam par mthong ba dang /_'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa la zhi ba'i rnam
[\[220b.5\]]par mthong ba'i mtshan ma yod pa'i phyir ro/_/sa lnga pa la ni bzo'i las kyi gnas rnam pa sna tshogs la 'jug cing rtog pa kun du 'byung ngo /_/sa drug pa la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed la sogs pa lugs bzhin pa dang /_ma rig pa 'gags
[\[220b.6\]]pas 'du byed 'gag pa la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa la rtogs pa'i mtshan ma yod pas/_sa de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med ces bya ba la/_sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
[\[220b.7\]]mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_ji ltar mtshan ma med pa zhes bya zhe na/_sa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des sa drug pa man chad la 'byung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon par 'du mi byed la spyod/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]ces bya ba la/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni/_mngon par 'du mi byed pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir sa de gsum la gnas pa la mngon par 'du mi byed pa la spyod
[\[221a.2\]]pa zhes bya zhe na/_de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rtsol 'bad med par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du gnas pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga po ni/_/sa rnams kun du shes par bya/_/
[\[221a.3\]]zhes bya ba la mos pa spyod pa'i sa yan chad sa bcu pa man chad sa bcu gcig rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa lnga zhig yod par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/da ni byang chub sems dpa' de lnga'i mtshan nyid bshad de/_de la gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub
[\[221a.4\]]pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrubs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das par mi bsngo'o/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par bsngo zhing smon lam 'debs pa de/_byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan
[\[221a.5\]]nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir 'dod la ma chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la 'dod pa la ma chags pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dang /_longs spyod la ma chags
[\[221a.6\]]shing phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/las gsum rnam par dag ces bya ba la/_las gsum rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshul khrims la gnas na lus kyi sgo nas srog mi gcod/_ma byin par mi len/_mi tshangs par mi
[\[221a.7\]]spyod pas/_lus kyi las rnam par dag pa dang ngag gi sgo nas brdzun dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig 'khyal ba mi smra bas ngag gi las rnam par dag pa dang /_yid kyi sgo nas chags sems dang gnod sems dang log pa'i lta ba med pas yid kyi las rnam par
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]dag go/_/khro ba zil gnon zhes bya ba la/_khro ba zil gyis gnon pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bzod pa la gnas na zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bar zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro/_/yon tan mchog la brtson zhes bya ba la/_yon tan gyi sgras ni/_sbyin pa la sogs pa 'jig
[\[221b.2\]]rten las 'das pa'i dge ba la bya ste/_yon tan mchog la brtson pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_brtson 'grus kyis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba thams cad bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i phyir ro/_/chos la mi g.yo zhes bya ba la/_chos la mi g.yo ba ni bsam gtan
[\[221b.3\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bsam gtan gyis ni sems rtse gcig tu gzhag pa'i sems las sems phyi rol du g.yo zhing g.yeng ba mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang dag zab mo mthong zhes bya ba la/_yang dag zab mo ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'o/_/yang dag zab mo mthong ba ni
[\[221b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyis bdag med pa gnyis mthong zhing khong du chud pa'i phyir ro/_/'di yan chad kyi tshig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa bstan to/_/byang chub chen por mos ldan byang chub sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang du pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[221b.5\]]bsgrub pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces bsngo ba ni byang chub chen por mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam
[\[221b.6\]]'debs pas byang chub sems dpa' yin par bstan pa'i phyir/_phan 'dogs 'dod dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sbyin pa ni bza' ba dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i yo byad kyis sems can rnams
[\[221b.7\]]la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/_/gnod pa med par lta zhes bya ba la/_gnod pa med par lta ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshul khrims la gnas pa rnams sems can gzhan gyi srog mi gcod pas na srog la gnod par mi byed/_nor la ma
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]byin par mi len pas na/_longs spyod la gnod par mi byed/_gzhan gyi bud med la mi tshangs par mi spyod pas na chung ma la gnod par mi byed do/_/pha rol gnod byed dag la bzod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la pha rol gnod byed la bzod pa ni
[\[222a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bzod pa la gnas pa rnams ni/_sems can gzhan gyis bdag gi srog dang longs spyod la gnod pa byas kyang /_slar gnod pa'i lan ldon par mi byed de/_'di ni bzod pa gsum las gnod pa la ji snyam pa'i bzod
[\[222a.3\]]pa bstan to/_/brtan pa zhes bya ba la brtan pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams pa ste/_brtson 'grus drag po dang ldan pa'i rnam pa ni/_dge ba'i phyogs la brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bas/_
[\[222a.4\]]mi skrag cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi ldog pa'i brtan pa zhes bya'o/_/bag yod ces bya ba la 'du 'dzi mang po'i nang na gnas shing bsam gtan thob pa'i ro la chags pa'i rnam pa ni bag med pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni
[\[222a.5\]]bag yod pa zhes bya ste/_bsam gtan rdzogs par bya ba'i dgon pa na gnas shing bsam gtan gyi ro la ma chags par byed pas na bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/mang du thos pa dang zhes bya ba la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po las chos mang du thos na/_
[\[222a.6\]]shes rab 'byung bas mang du thos pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ste/_'di yan chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa bstan to/_/pha rol don brtson byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa sgrubs pa'i rnam pa
[\[222a.7\]]sems can yongs su bsgral bar bya ba'i don du/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba ni pha rol gyi don la brtson pa zhes bya ste/_des na byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrub la byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de byang
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]chub sems dpa' yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub cing byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa byang chub sems dpa' yin par bstan pa'i phyir rang gis yongs su bzung ba nyes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[222b.2\]]pa smos te/_rang gis yongs su bzung ba ni bdag la yod pa'i yo byad dang longs spyod la bya ste/_bdag gi longs spyod rnams la/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rmi lam dang /_sgyu ma lta bu yin zhing longs spyod la chags pa'i skyon gyis ngan song gsum du
[\[222b.3\]]skye ba dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thos par bya ba la/_bar du gcod pa'i nyes pa yod par ma mthong ba rnams ni sbyin pa la 'jug par mi byed kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gi longs spyod la chags na skyon dang nyes pa yod
[\[222b.4\]]par mthong bas/_phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bar byed do/_'dis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan to/_/longs spyod ma chags zhes bya ba la/_gang gis 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod dang /_zang zing la chags pa rnams ni khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar
[\[222b.5\]]mi nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dang zang zing la chags pa med pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba ste/_'dis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan to/_/zhe la 'dzin pa med ces bya ba la/_sems can gyis gnod pa byas pa dang
[\[222b.6\]]phrad nas 'dis bdag la 'di lta bu zhig gnod pa byas kyi/_lan ldon du btang ngo snyam du sems pa ni zhe la 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang /_slar gnod pa bya'o snyam du sems pa'i bsam pa med pas/_zhe
[\[222b.7\]]la 'dzin pa med pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa la sogs pa'i dge ba la rgyun du 'jug cing sgrub pa ni rnal 'byor zhes bya ste/_'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]pa dang 'dra bar bstan to/_/mtshan ma mkhas zhes bya ba la/_nam sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa na/_zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma dang /_gzengs bstod pa'i mtshan ma dang /_btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma la bsgom pa ni/_mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhes bya
[\[223a.2\]]zhe na/_gang gi tshe sems la 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la sogs pa g.yeng bar gyur ba'i dus na ni 'khor ba'i skyon yid la bya ba la sogs pa zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma yid la byas nas sems zhi bar bya'o/_/nam sems gnyid dang rmugs pas non te mi gsal bar gyur na bsam gtan gyi 'bras
[\[223a.3\]]bu'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la sogs pa yid la bya ba gzengs bstod pa mtshan ma yid la byas nas sems gso bar bya'o/_/nam zhum rgod spangs pa'i phyir bsngos na theg pa chen po'i spyod pa las mi nyams par 'gyur bas na/_nang du rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/_tshig
[\[223a.4\]]des byang chub chen por smon lam btab po/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrubs la/_byang chub chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang 'debs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub
[\[223a.5\]]pa dang /_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir snying rje ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la sems can bkres pa dang grang ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams la snying rje med pa dag ni bza' ba
[\[223a.6\]]dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i yo byad gtong zhing sbyin par mi byed kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yo byad kyis phongs te/_sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje dang ldan pas bza' ba dang bgo ba la sogs pa gtong zhing sbyin par byed de/_'dis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub
[\[223a.7\]]pa brtan to/_/ngo tsha yon tan gnas zhes bya ba la/_gang dag srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa la sogs pas sdig pa'i las byed pa la 'dzem zhing ngo tsha ba med pa de dag la tshul khrims med kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo tsha ba'i yon tan la gnas pa ste/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa la sogs pa sdig pa'i las byed pa bag tsha zhing 'dzem pas/_de dag cung zad kyang mi byed de/_'dis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa bstan to/_/sdug bsngal bzod cing zhes bya ba la/_gang dag gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang /_bcing ba
[\[223b.2\]]la sogs pa'i gnod pa byas pa la/_mi bzod pa de dag ni slar sems can la gnod pa byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa'i sdug bsngal rnams bzod cing nyams su len pas gzhan la slar gnod pa mi byed de/_'dis ni bzod pa'i pha rol
[\[223b.3\]]tu phyin pa bsgrub pa bstan to/_/bdag gi bde la chags zhes bya ba la/_gang dag nyan pa dang /_sems pa la sogs pa'i dge ba byed na/_bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod cing /_nyal ba dang 'phres pa tsam gyis bdag gi bde ba la chags pa de dag ni/_bdag
[\[223b.4\]]dang gzhan gyi don du brtson 'grus rtsom par mi nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nyan pa la sogs pa'i dge ba byed pas na/_grang ba dang bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bzod cing nyal ba dang /_'phres pa la sogs pa'i bdag gi bde ba la ma chags pas bdag dang
[\[223b.5\]]gzhan gyi don du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgrub pa bstan to/_/dran gtso bo zhes bya ba la/_gang dag sems nyon mongs pa'i dbang du song nas bsgom par bya ba'i yul brjed pa de dag la ni bsam gtan med kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[223b.6\]]rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yul ma brjed pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu yang bsam gtan dang ldan te/_'dis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa bstan to/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag nyid ces bya ba la gang sems mnyam par gzhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin med pa de
[\[223b.7\]]dag la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i shes rab med kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rtag tu sems mnyam par gzhag pas/_yod med gang yang mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan te/_'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa bstan to/_/'di yan chad kyis
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa bstan pa yin no/_/theg pa mi 'khrugs byang chub sems dpa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa rnams 'jig rten gyi longs spyod dang /_theg pa chung ngu'i mya ngan las 'das par bsngos na ni theg pa
[\[224a.2\]]chen po'i spyod pa las nyams pas/_theg pa chen po las 'khrugs pa zhes bya na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrubs pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngos pas theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la ma nyams pa'i phyir theg pa
[\[224a.3\]]las mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrub la/_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de la/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan
[\[224a.4\]]gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal spangs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la sdug bsngal spangs pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sbyin pas
[\[224a.5\]]sems can grang ba dang bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams la bza' ba dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i yo byad byin nas grang ba dang bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal med par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal byed pa med ces bya ba la/_sdug bsngal bar byed pa
[\[224a.6\]]med pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshul khrims kyis sems can gyi srog mi gcod/_nor la ma byin par mi len pas na srog dang nor la sogs pa la sdug bsngal skyed par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal bzod cing zhes bya ba la sdug bsngal bzod pa ni bzod pa'i
[\[224a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams sems can gzhan gyis/_lus dang srog la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas shing sdug bsngal skyed kyang sdug bsngal nyams su len cing slar gnod pa'i lan mi ldon pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal 'jigs pa med ces bya
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_dge ba'i phyogs la brtson 'grus drag tu brtsams pa rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i dus na/_grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal byung yang 'jigs pa med de/_brtson 'grus
[\[224b.2\]]brtsams pa las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal rnam grol zhes bya ba la sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas khams gong mar gtogs par
[\[224b.3\]]skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi ngan song gsum du skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal de la mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal rtog pa med ces bya ba la/_sdug bsngal la rtog pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[224b.4\]]dang ldan pa rnams bdag dang sdug bsngal skye ba'i rgyu dang sdug bsngal gsum la rang bzhin yod par mi rtog pa'i phyir te/_'di dag gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa bstan to/_/sdug bsngal khas len byang chub sems dpa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sdug bsngal khas
[\[224b.5\]]len pa ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa ste/_byang chub don du smon lam 'debs pa na sems can gyi don du/_bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par shog cig ces smon lam 'debs la/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang sems can gyi don du 'khor ba mi gtong bar khas blangs
[\[224b.6\]]na/_gdod bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur la/_'khor ba yang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pas 'khor ba khas blangs na/_sdug bsngal khas blangs pa yin te/_'dis ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang sgrub
[\[224b.7\]]la/_byang chub chen por yang smon lam 'debs pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa dang /_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa'i
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]phyir/_chos dga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la chos la dga' ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ste/_sbyin pa dang ldan pa rnams phyi nang gi dngos po gtong ba'i chos la dga' ba'i phyir ro/_/rang bzhin chos la dga' zhes bya ba
[\[225a.2\]]la/_rang bzhin gyis chos la dga' ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba chos rdul tsam yang mi 'byung bar dga' ba'i phyir ro/_/chos la smod cing zhes bya ba la/_chos la smod pa ni/_bzod
[\[225a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ste/_bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams mi bzod pas 'gyur ba'i rgyu zhe sdang gi chos la smod pa byed pa'i phyir ro/_/chos la brtson zhes bya ba la chos la brtson pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dag ste/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i
[\[225a.4\]]rnams 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos la rtag tu brtson pa'i phyir ro/_/chos dbang zhes bya ba la chos la dbang byed pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ste/_bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du dbang sgyur zhing /_
[\[225a.5\]]'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro/_/chos la mun pa med ces bya ba la chos la mun pa med pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa rnams te/_dper na mun pa med par gyur na/_blta bar bya ba'i dngos po rnams gsal bar
[\[225a.6\]]mthong bar 'gyur ba bzhin du/_shes rab kyi snang ba skyes pa rnams kyis kyang /_chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir/_shes rab dang ldan pa rnams chos la mun pa med pa zhes bya ste/_tshig gang dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa bstan to/_/
[\[225a.7\]]chos gtsor byed pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrubs pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces bsngos shing der gzhal bar byas na/_chos gtsor byed pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrubs la byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de la/_byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa de byang chub
[\[225b.2\]]sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir longs spyod bag yod ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/gang dag 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod yod pa bdag nyid spyod cing gzhan la mi gtong ba de dag ni/_longs spyod la bag med pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor los
[\[225b.3\]]sgyur ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyang mi gtsang ba lta bur mthong bas/_gzhan la gtong bar byed pas longs spyod la bag yod pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan to/_/gdul ba la bag yod dang zhes bya ba la gang dag gis bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba
[\[225b.4\]]dang /_rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ma bsrungs pa de dag ni gdul ba la bag med pa ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid gsum ma thul pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba gnyis ka srung bar byed pas gdul ba
[\[225b.5\]]la bag yod pa ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid gsum dul ba'i phyir te/_'dis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/bsrung ba bag yod ces bya ba la/_gang dag gzhan gyis gnod pa byas na/_sems 'khrugs nas gzhan la gnod pa byed
[\[225b.6\]]pa de dag ni/_bsrung ba la bag med de/_bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i sems ma bsrungs pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang /_bdag nyid zhe mi sdang zhing gzhan la slar gnod pa mi byed pas/_bsrung ba la bag yod pa zhes
[\[225b.7\]]bya ste/_bdag gi sems kyang zhe sdang gi dbang du ma song bar bsrungs la/_gzhan gyi sems kyang 'khrugs par mi 'gyur par bsrung ba'i phyir te/_'dis ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/dge ba bag yod dang zhes bya ba la/_gang le lo'i dbang du
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]song nas dge ba mi byed pa de dag ni dge ba la bag med pa zhes bya ste/_de la dge ba 'phel ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni le lo thams cad spangs nas/_mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i dge ba rgyun du spyod pas/_dge ba la bag
[\[226a.2\]]yod pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan to/_/dge ba la bag yod ces bya ba la/_gang dag bsam gtan thob kyang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro la chags par byed pa de dag ni bde ba la bag med pa zhes bya ste/_bsam gtan khyad
[\[226a.3\]]par can mi thob cing /_sngar thob pa'i bsam gtan las kyang nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam gtan thob kyang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro la chags par mi byed pas/_de la bag yod pa zhes bya ba ste/_'dis ni bsam gtan
[\[226a.4\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/chos la bag yod pa zhes bya ba la/_gang dag gis chos rnams la rtag pa dang /_bag yod pa la sogs par bzung ba de dag ni chos la bag med pa zhes bya ste/_chos kyi mtshan nyid log par bzung ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems
[\[226a.5\]]dpa' rnams mi rtag pa dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos la bag yod pa zhes bya ste/_chos kyi mtshan nyid ma nor bar bzung ba'i phyir ro/_/'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan te/_tshig de dag gis pha
[\[226a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa smras pa yin no/_/theg pa bag yod byang chub sems dpa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngos na theg pa chen po la bag yod pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni byang chub chen por smon
[\[226a.7\]]lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrubs la/_byang chub chen por yang smon lam 'debs pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrubs pa dang /_byang chub chen
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]por smon lam 'debs pa de/_byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_sbyin med ngo tsha zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la dper na slong ba po rnams la bslangs pa las/_gtong bas ma byin na ngo tsha'o/_/de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems
[\[226b.2\]]dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis ma bslangs par gtong ba'i bdag nyid can yin na/_gal te slong ba po 'ongs pa'i tshe/_mig gnags nas bkyigs te ma byin na ngo tsha'o/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi chos nyid dang 'gal lo zhes slong ba po 'ongs pa'i rnams la
[\[226b.3\]]phyi nang gi dngos po sbyin par byed de/_'dis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/nyes chung ngo tsha zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba 'byung ba srung ba bzhin du bcas
[\[226b.4\]]pa'i kha na ma tho ba nyes pa chung ngu rdul tsam la yang 'jigs par lta bas/_gal te nyes pa chung ngu rdul tsam byung na yang ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pa yin no/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid las 'das so zhes nyes pa chung ngu yang srung bar byed de/_'dis ni tshul
[\[226b.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan pa'o/_/mi bzod ngo tsha zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs thams cad dang dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la/_bzod par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin na gal te mi bzod pa'i sems shig byung
[\[226b.6\]]na yang byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha bar byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las 'das so zhes dus thams cad du phyogs thams cad du sems can thams cad la bzod par byed de/_'dis ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/nyams
[\[226b.7\]]pas ngo tsha ba dang zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis le lo spangs nas/_brtson 'grus kyi mthus dge ba rgyun du byed pa'i bdag nyid can yin na/_gal te le lo'i dbang du byas nas brtson 'grus nyams pas dge ba rgyun du mi byed na ngo tsha ba yin no/_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal lo zhes le lo spangs nas brtson 'grus rgyun du rtsom par byed do/_/'dis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bstan to/_/g.yeng bas ngo tsha zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis
[\[227a.2\]]lus dben par byed de dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_sems dben par byed de gzugs la sogs pa la rtog cing g.yeng ba spong ba'i bdag nyid yin na/_gal te lus 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas shing sems gzugs la sogs pa la g.yeng na ngo tsha bar byed de/_de bas na byang chub
[\[227a.3\]]sems dpa'i chos nyid las 'das so zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyi 'du 'dzi dang sems kyi g.yeng ba gnyi ga spong bar byed de/_'dis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan to/_/lta chung ngo tsha zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang
[\[227a.4\]]bzhin gyis shes rab chen po dang ldan pas/_lta ba chen po'i bdag nyid can te/_gang zag dang chos la bdag med par lta ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bu yin pa las chos la bdag med par lta ba ni med kyi/_lta ba chung ngu gang zag la bdag med pa tsam du lta na/_byang chub sems
[\[227a.5\]]dpa' ngo tsha ba'o/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las 'das so zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang zag dang chos gnyi ga la bdag med par lta ste/_'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par bstan te/_tshig de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[227a.6\]]sgrub pa bstan pa yin no/_/theg gzhan ngo tsha byang chub sems dpa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa yang bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bsngos shing smon lam 'debs pa yin na/_gal te pha
[\[227a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa rnams theg pa gzhan te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo zhing smon lam 'debs na ngo tsha ba yin no/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las 'das so zhes pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rnams byang chub chen por thob par bya ba'i sngo bar byed de 'dis ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa bstan to/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang bsgrub la/_byang chub chen por yang smon lam 'debs pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/slong ba la rim gro med
[\[227b.2\]]pa'o zhes bya ba la/_slong ba 'ongs na mig gnags nas bkyigs te ster ba ni rim gro med pa zhes kyang bya ste/_de lta bu dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la 'dod la ma chags las gsum rnam dag ces bya ba nas
[\[227b.3\]]brtsams te/_theg gzhan ngo tshas byang chub sems dpa'o/_/zhes bya ba yan chad kyis don gyi rnam grangs gzhan nas gzhan du sbyar te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa dang byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa bstan to
[\[227b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dgong pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa dang byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa'i don/_rnam grangs du mas rgyas par bshad pa'i don gyi mjug mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i phyir/_'di dang pha rol dag dang btang snyoms kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
[\[227b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa gcig smos so/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'dis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pa dang /_byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar sems can la phan 'dogs pa de ston to/_/phan 'dogs pa yang rnam pa
[\[227b.6\]]gnyis te/_rgyu'i chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang /_'bras bu'i chos kyis phan 'dogs pa'o/_/de la tshe 'dir phan 'dogs pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas byed de/_yo byad kyis phongs pa rnams la yo byad byin nas longs spyod pa la gzhag pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs so/_/
[\[227b.7\]]tshe rabs pha rol du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas phan 'dogs te/_sems can dag tshul khrims la bkod na/_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i skye ba bzang po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i sgo nas phan
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'dogs te/_sems can gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang /_slar gnod pa'i lan mi glon zhing ci'ang mi byed par btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyor bar 'du byed pa dang zhes bya ba la/_sbyor ba ni sems can gyi las su bya ba'o/_/'du byed pa ni grogs
[\[228a.2\]]su 'gro ba ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can gyi las su bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs so/_/'byor pa thob ces bya ba la/_'byor pa thob pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pa la bya ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par shes pas
[\[228a.3\]]thob par byas nas mngon par shes pa thob pa'i sgo nas sems can la phan 'dogs so/_/mtshungs par ston dang zhes bya ba la/_theg pa gsum gyi chos gang la gang bstan na 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ston pa zhes bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni sems can
[\[228a.4\]]dang 'tsham pa'i chos bshad de/_the tshom bcad pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs so/_/de ltar tshig de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub pas rgyu'i chos kyis phan 'dogs par bstan to/_/'bras bu chen pos phan 'dogs par 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya
[\[228a.5\]]ba la/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngos nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ste/_byang chub thob pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgo nas sems can la phan 'dogs pa dang /_'jug par byed de/_
[\[228a.6\]]'dis ni byang chub chen por smon pas 'bras bu'i chos kyis phan 'dogs pa bstan to/_/de ltar rgyu'i chos kyis kyang phan 'dogs pa 'bras bu'i chos kyis kyang phan 'dogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid spyir rnam
[\[228a.7\]]par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad do zhes bya ba la/_de ltar sa bcu gcig po dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' grangs kyis du yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas da ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mi dbye bar mtshan du ji skad bya ba'i mtshan 'chad do/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]de la ming la rnam pa gnyis te don dang bcas pa dang don med pa'o/_/de la don dang bcas pa ni yon tan las drangs nas ming du btags pa ste/_dper na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/don med pa ni dper na mi dbul po la dbang phyug ces btags pa lta bu'o/_/
[\[228b.2\]]'dir byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mtshan gyi rnam grangs bcu drug po 'byung ste/_de dag thams cad ni yon tan las drangs nas mtshan du btags pas don dang bcas par rig par bya'o/_/gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes bya zab mo la
[\[228b.3\]]dad pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/mthu chen po mos pas na/_sems dpa' che zhes bya ste/_mthu chen po ni ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa ston pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na
[\[228b.4\]]bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya bar sems pas byang chub sems dpa'o/_/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral nas mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag par sems pas na sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/yang na shes rab dang ldan pas na
[\[228b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyang 'khor ba na gnas kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus ni chen por 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/yang na
[\[228b.6\]]chen po rnam pa bdun dang ldan pas sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/_chen po rnam pa bdun ni sngar bshad pa rnams so/_/shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i shes rab dang ldan pas/_blo ldan zhes bya ba zab mo'i don gyi dgongs pa 'grel par byed pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po thob pas
[\[228b.7\]]na gzi brjid mchog ces bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pas na rgyal ba'i sras so zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pas bya ba la zhugs pas na rgyal ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/_/sku gsum 'bras bur gyur pa dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dab ma lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu byed pas na rgyal ba'i myu gu zhes bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byed pas na rnam par rgyal byed ces bya'o/_/bdud bzhi 'joms par byed pa'i
[\[229a.2\]]grogs med par dpa' bo gcig pu yin pas na mthu rtsal can zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis ma rtogs pa'i chos ngo mtshar du bya ba don dam pa'i chos rtogs pas na ngo mtshar mchog ces bya'o/_/'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par zhugs pa'i sems can gyi 'dron
[\[229a.3\]]pa mang po rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par byed pas na/_ded dpon zhes bya'o/_/phyogs bcu thams cad du yon tan gyi dris khyab pas na/_grags pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pas na bsod
[\[229a.4\]]nams che zhes bya'o/_/sems can thams cad bsgrub pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas na snying rje can zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i longs spyod chen po dang ldan pas na dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan
[\[229a.5\]]pas na chos ldan zhes bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan bcu drug gi don so sor bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir de nyid legs rtogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so/_/de la khyad par rnam pa lnga khong du chud cing
[\[229a.6\]]rtogs pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_khyad par rnam pa lnga ni de nyid legs par rtogs pa dang /_don chen po legs par rtogs pa dang /_thams cad kyi don rtogs pa dang /_rtag pa'i don rtogs pa dang /_thabs rtogs pa ste/_de lnga rtogs pas
[\[229a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de la gang zag la bdag med pa dang /_chos la bdag med par rtogs pas na de nyid legs rtogs pa'o/_/bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don 'grub par bya ba rtogs pas na don chen po legs par rtogs pa'o/_/'dus byas dang
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'dus ma byas dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa la sogs pa'i chos ma lus par rtogs pas na thams cad kyi don rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bar 'ga' shes pa dang /_bar 'ga' shes pa dang mi ldan pas ma yin gyi phung po
[\[229b.2\]]lhag ma ma lus par spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zhugs kyang mkhyen pa zad pa med par rtogs pas na rtag pa rtogs so/_/sems can gang la chos gang bstan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang sku ci 'dra ba bstan nas 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos de bstan pa dang /_sku de rtogs
[\[229b.3\]]pa'i thabs rtogs pas na thabs rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis khyad par rnam pa bzhi rtogs pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar bstan pa'i phyir/_bdag gi rjes shes phra mo'i lta ba shes/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnam rig shes pa dang /_/thams
[\[229b.4\]]cad yang dag ma yin kun rtogs shes/_/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sems dang yid rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang de gsum char yang dag pa ma yin par kun du rtog pa'i mtshan nyid yin par shes pas na/_
[\[229b.5\]]de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de la sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bya ste/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa rtogs pas na/_bdag gi rjes shes pa zhes bya ste/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs nas bdag tu rtog
[\[229b.6\]]pa 'jug pas na/_kun gzhi'i rang bzhin shes pa la bdag gi rjes shes pa'o zhes btags so/_/de la ji ltar shes pa na kun gzhi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur zhe na/_sum cu pa'i rab tu byed pa las/_de la kun gzhi rnam shes ni/_/rnam smin sa bon thams cad pa/_/
[\[229b.7\]]len pa dag dang de yi gnas/_/rig pa rnam par mi rig pa'o/_/rtag tu rig dang yid byed dang /_/rigs dang 'du shes sems par ldan/_/de ni tshor ba btang snyoms te/_/ma bsgribs lung ma bstan kyang de/_/zhes bshad pa lta bur shes na kun gzhi rang bzhin shes
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa yin no/_/'di ni nyon mongs pa'i yid la bya ste kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la nga dang bdag gir dmigs pa byed pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/_phra mo'i lta ba shes pa zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin shes pa
[\[230a.2\]]la phra mor lta ba shes zhes bya'o zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i yid ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba lung du ma bstan pa byed pa'i dus na yang nga'o snyam pa dang /_bdag go snyam du sems pa rtag tu 'byung bas na/_blta dka' ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i yid shes pa la/_phra mo lta ba shes pa
[\[230a.3\]]zhes btags so/_/ji ltar shes pa na nyon mongs pa'i yid shes par 'gyur zhe na/_sum cu pa'i rab tu dbye ba las/_de la gnas te rab 'jug cing /_/de la dmigs pas yid ces bya/_/rnam shes ngar sems bdag nyid can/_/nyon mongs bzhi dang 'grogs
[\[230a.4\]]pa ste/_/rtag tu bsgribs la lung ma bstan/_/ces bshad pa'i tshul du shes na nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin shes pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug la bya ste/_
[\[230a.5\]]rnam par shes pa drug gi rang bzhin shes pas na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar shes na rnam par shes pa drug gi rang bzhin shes pa yin zhe na/_sum cu pa'i rab tu dbye ba las/_/gsum ni rnam pa drug po la/_/dmigs pa gang yin
[\[230a.6\]]de dag ste/_/kun du 'gro dang bye brag gis/_/sems la byung ba dge ba dang /_/de bzhin nyon mongs nye nyon mongs/_/tshor ba gsum dang de ldan no/_/zhes bshad pa'i tshul du shes na rnam par shes pa drug gi rang bzhin shes pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa
[\[230a.7\]]brgyad po de dag kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa lta bu rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin par shes pa ni thams cad yang dag ma yin pa kun du rtog par shes pa'o/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis spyod par rnam pa lnga rtogs pas na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_mi shes shes pa rjes su shes pa shes/_/dngos po med shes rjes su 'byung ba shes/_/mi shes shes pa so sor shes pas na/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/zhes smos te/_rnam pa lnga shes pa ni mi shes pa shes pa so
[\[230b.2\]]sor shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa so sor shes pa dang /_dngos po med pa so sor shes pa dang /_'byung ba rjes su shes pa so sor shes pa dang /_mi shes pa shes pa so sor shes pa ste/_de ltar rnam pa lngas shes pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
[\[230b.3\]]ba/_de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngos lta bur dmigs pa yin no zhes shes pas na/_mi shes pa shes pa so sor zhes bya ste/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la gzung ba 'dzin pa lta bu'i shes pa med pas mi shes
[\[230b.4\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/'on kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin te/_me long gi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan snang ba lta bur ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor der yang /_shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bas shes pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/dag pa
[\[230b.5\]]'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam lta bur dmigs par byed pa yin par shes pas na/_rjes su shes pa zhes bya ba ste/_dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las byung bas rjes su shes
[\[230b.6\]]pa zhes btags so/_/yang na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi la sogs pa rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba lugs bzhin pa dag ma rig pa las byung ba shes pa mi shes pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa 'gags na 'du byed 'gag pa nas
[\[230b.7\]]skye ba 'gags na rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i rang bzhin shes pas na rjes su shes pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/kun btags kyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni ri bong gi rwa bzhin du rang bzhin med par shes pas dngos po med pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/ji snyed kyi
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_sdug bsngal ba thams cad ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid las byung bar shes pas na 'byung ba rjes su shes pa zhes bya'o/_/yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni gzung 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i
[\[231a.2\]]mtshan nyid yin par shes pas na mi shes pa shes pas so sor shes pa zhes bya ste yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la gzung 'dzin gyi shes pa med pas ni mi shes pa zhes bya'o/_/ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin pas na shes pa zhes bya'o/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyi shes bya'i khyad
[\[231a.3\]]par rnam pa lnga shes pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/don med shes shing don dam shes pa dang /_/thams cad shes dang ma lus don shes dang /_/shes bya shes gnas shes pa yongs shes pas/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang zhes
[\[231a.4\]]bya ba smos te/_shes bya'i khyad par rnam pa lnga shes pa ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid shes pa dang /_yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang /_kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid shes pa dang /_shes pa dang shes pa po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du shes pa dang /_
[\[231a.5\]]shes bya dang shes pa po dang /_shes pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag par shes pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de la don med par shes pa ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid shes pa ste/_khams gsum thams cad gzhan dbang tsam du zad
[\[231a.6\]]kyi/_de las gzhan pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i don yod pa ma yin par shes pa dang /_ji tsam du gzhan dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa de tsam du don med pa'i ngo bo skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rgyun du 'byung bar shes so/_/don dam
[\[231a.7\]]pa shes pa ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa ste/_yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin par shes pa'o/_/thams cad shes pa ni kun du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa ste/_gzugs la sogs
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]pa'i gzung ba'i chos rnams dang /_mig la sogs pa'i chos de gzung 'dzin du kun brtags pa'i chos thams cad ni ri bong gi rwa bzhin dang mtshan nyid med par shes pa'o/_/ma lus pa'i don shes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa
[\[231b.2\]]med pa la sogs pa'i shes bya'i chos kun rdzob kyi bden pa thams cad shes pa ste/_ji snyed du kun rdzob kyi chos thams cad ni smra ba dang /_bsam pa'i yul du myur bar shes par bya'o/_/shes bya dang shes pa'i gnas dang /_shes pa gsum shes pa ni shes bya dang shes pa
[\[231b.3\]]po dang /_shes pa gsum 'khor gsum yongs su dag par shes pa dang /_don dam par na shes bya ste phyi'i yul dang /_shes pa po ste gang zag dang /_shes bya ste shes rab gsum rang bzhin med par shes pa'o/_/de la don med par shes pa dang /_don dam
[\[231b.4\]]par shes pa dang /_thams cad shes pas ni mtshan nyid gsum shes pa bstan to/_/ma lus pa'i don rnam pa thams cad du shes pa dang /_shes bya dang /_shes pa po dang /_shes pa gsum 'khor gsum yongs su dag par shes pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa
[\[231b.5\]]shes pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa shes pa bstan to/_/yang rnam grangs gzhan gyis rnam pa lnga shes pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_rdzogs pa shes dang gnas kyang shes pa dang /_/mang shes rim gyis ston par shes pa dang /_/
[\[231b.6\]]rab tu the tshom bsal ba shes pa dang /_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya'o/_/zhes bya ba smos te de la rdzogs pa shes pa ni 'og min gyi pho brang du rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i skus mngon par sangs rgyas par bya ba shes pa'o/_/yang na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bzhi dang
[\[231b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa lnga thob nas/_shes bya thams cad rnam pa thams cad du ma lus par shes pa ni rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/gnas shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs shing lha rnams la phan gdags par bya bar shes pa'o/_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]mang shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis yum gyi lhums su gshegs shing /_yum gyi lhums su sems can gyi don ji ltar mdzad par bya ba shes pa'o/_/rim gyis ston pa shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis lhums nas 'byung ba dang /_pho
[\[232a.2\]]brang slas lnga brgya'i nang na 'dod pa'i longs spyod la spyod pa dang /_khab nas byung zhing rab tu 'byung ba dang /_lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa dang rdo rje gdan la sprul pa'i skus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bstan pa shes pa'o/_/rab tu the tshom sel ba shes pa ni sprul pa'i sku gang
[\[232a.3\]]gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can gyi the tshom yongs su gcad par bya ba shes pa'o/_/rnam grangs gzhan du yang rnam pa bcu gcig shes pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bstan to/_/rnam pa bcu gcig gis ni 'das pa shes pa dang /_ma
[\[232a.4\]]'ongs pa shes pa dang /_da ltar byung ba shes pa dang /_nang shes pa dang /_phyi shes pa dang /_rtsing ba shes pa dang /_zhib pa shes pa dang /_tha ma shes pa dang /_bzang po shes pa dang /_nye ba shes pa dang /_ring ba shes pa'o/_/rnyed dang zhes bya ba la/_'das pa
[\[232a.5\]]shes pa ni rnyed pa shes pa zhes bya ste/_'das pa'i chos ni rgyus 'bras bu bskyed nas gnyi ga 'gags par shes so/_/ma rnyed ces bya ba la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po shes pa ni ma rnyed pa shes pa zhes bya ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnams ni rgyu yang ma skyes la/_rgyu ma
[\[232a.6\]]skyes pas rgyus 'bras bu da dung ma bskyed par shes so/_/blo la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba la/_da ltar gyi dngos po shes pa ni blo rab tu gnas pa shes pa zhes bya ste/_da ltar gyi dngos po rnams ni rgyus 'bras bu bskyed nas/_da dung ma 'gags pas na sems can gyi
[\[232a.7\]]spyod yul du gyur par shes pa'o/_/shes pa dang zhes bya ba la/_bdag nyid kyi blos chos rnams mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la sogs par rtog pa ni shes pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni nang shes pa bstan to/_/rjes shes zhes bya ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gyi chos bstan pa thob pa las chos rnams mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa shes pa ni rjes su shes pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni phyi shes pa bstan to/_/so sor ston pa zhes bya ba la/_chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gzhan la ston pa'i blo dang shes pa la/_so sor ston
[\[232b.2\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan la ston pa'i shes pas ni rtsing ba shes pa bstan te/_chos ston pa'i blo ni ming tshig la sogs pa rags pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/smra med blo dang zhes bya ba la/_smra ba dang bshad pa thams cad spangs nas nang du bsam gtan du 'jog pa'i blo la smra med
[\[232b.3\]]blo zhes bya ste/_'dis ni zhib pa shes pa bstan te/_bsam gtan gyi shes pa ni sgra dang tshig la sogs pa thams cad las 'das pa rtog pa med pa'i sems rtse gcig la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/nga dang zhes bya ba la sa bdun pa man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa la nga rgyal
[\[232b.4\]]dang bcas pa'i shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'dis ni tha ma shes pa bstan te/_sa bdun pa man chad na nga rgyal phra mo yod pa dang /_rtsol 'bad da dung yod pa'i phyir ro/_/nga rgyal bcom zhes bya ba la/_sa brgyad pa dag ni shes pa'i nga rgyal bcom pa'i shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'dis ni
[\[232b.5\]]shes pa bzang po bstan te/_sa brgyad pa yan chad nga rgyal phra mo yang mi 'byung zhing brtsal 'bad spangs nas/_lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams kyi shes pa ni nga rgyal dang bcas pa zhes bya ste/_gzung 'dzin du rtog pa da
[\[232b.6\]]dung ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/sa dang po yan chad kyi shes pa ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i shes pa zhes bya ste/_gzung 'dzin du chags pa spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros blo ldan zhes bya ba'i tshig ni shes pa bcu gcig po gnas dang sbyar te/_rnyed pa shes pa'i blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa
[\[232b.7\]]dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ro/_/smin dang zhes bya ba la sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa la/_smin pa'i shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'dis ni nye ba'i shes pa bstan te sa brgyad pa yan chad rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa sangs rgyas kyi
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]sa dang nye ba'i phyir ro/_/ma smin pa zhes bya ba la sa bdun pa man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa la ma smin pa zhes bya'o/_/'dis ni ring ba'i ma smin pa'i shes pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni ring ba'i shes pa bstan to/_/yang na mos pa spyod pa'i sa
[\[233a.2\]]rnams kyi shes pa ni ma smin pa zhes bya ste/_de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du ma gyur pa dang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang thag ring bas 'dis ni ring ba'i shes pa bstan to/_/sa dang po la zhugs pa yan chad kyi shes pa ni smin pa'i shes pa zhes bya ste/_de la zhugs pa rnams kyis chos
[\[233a.3\]]kyi dbyings mngon sum du byas pa dang /_myur du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas na/_'dis ni nye ba'i shes pa bstan to/_/yon tan gyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so//_//mtshan ma rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so zhes bya ba la de ltar gong du bshad pa'i yon tan
[\[233a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan yang /_dge ba sbed pa yin te/_yon tan sgrogs su zin kyang gang na chu bya snang ba de na chu yod par mngon pa dang /_gang na dud pa'i mtshan ma snang ba de na me yod par mngon pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
[\[233a.5\]]dpa' de dag la yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga 'byung ste/_mtshan ma rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro ste/_de'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan to/_/
[\[233a.6\]]snying rje legs par smra ba dang /_/brtan pa lag pa brkyang ba dang /_/dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol/_/mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga ste/_snying rje
[\[233a.7\]]dang ldan pa dang legs par smra ba dang ldan pa dang /_brtan pa dang ldan pa dang /_lag pa brkyang ba dang /_dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'o/_/chos de lnga yang rnam pa lngar bshad de/_rang bzhin dang rten dang 'bras bu'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_go rims dang bsdu bas
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]so/_/de la snying rje'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa gnyis te/_bsam pa dang ldan pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de la bsam pa dang ldan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/_phan pa'i bsam pa dang /_bde ba'i bsam pa'o/_/de la mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslangs te/_dge ba'i gnas su
[\[233b.2\]]gzhag par sems pa ni phan pa'i bsam pa'o/_/ngan song gsum la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las bzlog nas thar pa dang mtho ris su gzhag par sems pa ni bde ba'i bsam pa zhes bya'o/_/de la bsgrub pa dang ldan pa ni bsam pa de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[233b.3\]]lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la 'god par mdzad do/_/de ni bsgrub pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de la legs par smra ba'i rang bzhin gang zhe na/_de la rnam pa
[\[233b.4\]]gnyis te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi gtam gyi rang bzhin dang /_chos 'chad pa'i gtam gyi rang bzhin no/_/de la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi gtam gyi rang bzhin yang rnam pa gnyis te/_kun du dga' bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'o/_/de la kun du dga' bar
[\[233b.5\]]byed pa ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer spangs nas/_rtag tu yang khams snyoms sam ma snyoms pa la sogs pa 'dri bar byed pa'o/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed pa ni gang sems can rnams kyi bu tsha gnyen bshes dar bar byed pa'am/_gter dang 'bru spel bar byed
[\[233b.6\]]par 'gyur ba mthong na/_de bzhin du gtam de dag byed pa'i sgo nas/_sems can rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/_/chos 'chad pa'i gtam gyi rang bzhin ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa chos gang bshad pas sems can rnams thar pa dang /_
[\[233b.7\]]mtho ris 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos de 'chad de/_'dis ni legs par smra ba'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin par bstan to/_/de la bstan pa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin dang brtson 'grus gsum dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bsgrub pa na/_sdug bsngal ba dang 'jigs pa gang byung yang mi skrag pa dang /_mi zhum pa dang mthu dang ldan pa dang /_mi ldog pa ste de ni brtan pa'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de la lag pa brkyang ba'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa gnyis te/_sbyin pa sbyin pa na rgya chen
[\[234a.2\]]po sbyin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa sbyin pa'o/_/de la gang nang gi dngos po la yang mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa thams cad gtong ba dang /_phyi'i dngos po la yang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyang sbyin pa ni rgya chen po sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa gang sbyin na de'i tshe
[\[234a.3\]]'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du gnod par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dug dang mtshon la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed kyi/_dngos po skyon med pa sbyin par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni lag pa brkyang ba'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de la dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel
[\[234a.4\]]pa'i rang bzhin ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa bzhi dang /_ldem po dgongs pa bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa'i bar ma chad par byed pa ste/_'di ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de la snying rje
[\[234a.5\]]dang ldan pa'i rten nam yul ni rnam pa lnga ste/_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can dang /_nyes par spyod pa'i sems can dang /_bag med pa'i sems can dang /_log par zhugs pa'i sems can dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba'i sems can no/_/de la ngan song gsum du
[\[234a.6\]]skyes pa'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/shan pa dang rngon pa la sogs pa lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas/_las ngan pa la zhugs pa rnams ni nyes par spyod pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/gang gar dang glu la sogs pa la chags shing
[\[234a.7\]]'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni bag med pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/gang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung yang /_mu stegs kyi lta ba sna tshogs la zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni log par zhugs pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/gang so so'i skye
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bo dge ba khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa rnams ni/_nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_sems can de lnga la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po 'byung ngo /_/de la legs par smra ba'i rten dang yul yang rnam pa lnga ste/_
[\[234b.2\]]yang dag par kun du smra ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed pa dang /_yang dag par skabs 'byed pa dang rig pa'i man ngag ston pa'o/_/de la nyin re zhing khams bde ba dang /_mi bde ba 'dri ba ni yang dag par kun du smra ba'o/_/
[\[234b.3\]]bu tsha gnyen bshes dar ba dang /_gter dang 'bru la sogs pa 'phel ba'i gtam smra ba ni yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'o/_/rgyal po dang rkun po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa byung na 'jigs pa'i bskyab bya ba'i tshig smra ba ni yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'o/_/gsol ba ma btab par
[\[234b.4\]]yang don du bya ba dang /_las su gnyer ba rnams kyi grogs bya bar khas len pa ni yang dag par skabs 'byed pa'o/_/thar pa dang mtho ris 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos 'chad pa ni yang dag par lung ston pa zhes bya ste/_rnam pa de dag la dmigs nas/_byang chub sems
[\[234b.5\]]dpa' rnams legs par smra ba la 'jug go/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtan pa'i rten dang yul yang rnam pa lnga ste/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong ba dang /_'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyis log pa sna tshogs byas pa
[\[234b.6\]]dang /_sems can rnams kyi don du dus ring por 'khor bar gnas par khas len pa dang /_'khor mang po'i nang na chos 'chad pa'i tshe/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis rnam pa du mar rgal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab tshig thams cad khas len cing rgya che ba'i chos
[\[234b.7\]]nyan pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa brkyang ba'i gnas dang rten kyang rnam pa lnga ste/_che ba sbyin pa dang /_tha dad pa med par sbyin pa dang /_gus par bya ste sbyin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_mi brten pa'i sbyin pa'o/_/de la phyi dang nang
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gi dngos po thams cad gtong ba ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/kha cig la sbyin kha cig la mi sbyin zhes bya ba med kyi 'dra ba kho nar sems can kun la sbyin par byed pa ni/_tha dad pa med pa sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/slong ba rnams la rang gi lag pas bkur sti dang bcas
[\[235a.2\]]pas sbyin par byed pa ni gus par sbyin par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/dug dang mtshon la sogs pa sbyin pa ni ma yin gyi sbyin pa gang sbyin na/_tshe rabs gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba sbyin par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu tshe rabs gzhan du
[\[235a.3\]]rnam par smin pa la ma chags/_tshe rabs 'dir lan la ma chags par sbyin pa ni mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i rten dang yul la yang rnam pa lnga ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[235a.4\]]rnams kyi mdo sde zab mo zab par snang ba stong pa nyid dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba lugs dang lugs las bzlog pa ni rten dang po'o/_/'dul ba yang ltung ba la mkhas pa dang /_ltung ba slong ba la mkhas pa ni rten gnyis pa'o/_/chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan
[\[235a.5\]]nyid phyin ci ma log par rnam par 'jog pa ni rten gsum pa'o/_/mdo sde de dang de dag gi nang nas dgongs pa dang bcas pa'i ming dang tshig la sogs pa rnam par 'byed pa ni rten bzhi pa'o/_/chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshig tha dad par dbye ba ni rten lnga pa'o/_/de la snying rje
[\[235a.6\]]dang ldan pa rnams tshe 'dir yang dgra med cing bde bar gnas pa'i sems 'thob pa dang /_tshe rabs gzhan du yang bde 'gro lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o/_/legs par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gi nyes pa
[\[235a.7\]]rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/_brdzun dang phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du bdag gi tshig btsun pa dang /_tshig gzhan gyis bzung bar 'gyur ba ni snyan par smra ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/brtan pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sems dpa' ni tshe 'dir yang thams cad nas thams cad du le lo dang snyom las dang bral bar 'gyur zhing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len par byed la/_blangs nas kyang mi 'dor ba dang /_bzod pas bdag dang pha rol rjes
[\[235b.2\]]su 'dzin pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las su bya zhing brtsams pa'i rnam pa la brtan por rtsom ste/_brtsams pa mthar ma phyin gyi bar du bar ma dor mi ldog pa 'di dag ni brtan pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' lag
[\[235b.3\]]brkyang pa dang ldan pa rnams ni phyi nang gi dngos po gtong ba'i sgo nas tshe 'dir sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang /_de'i rkyen gyis bdag nyid tshe rabs gzhan du longs spyod chen por 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi tshogs chen por yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_'di ni lag pa
[\[235b.4\]]brkyang ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'dir yang mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo lta bu 'chad pa'i sgo nas/_sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa dang log par shes pa dang /_the tshom sel ba tshe rabs gzhan du yang rig pa'i
[\[235b.5\]]gnas thams cad la mkhas pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po 'thob ste/_'di ni dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/mtshan ma lnga po 'di dag gi go rims ni thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje bar byed pas snying rje dang por bshad
[\[235b.6\]]do/_/de nas snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang dge ba'i gnas su gzhag pa'i don du rigs pa'i man ngag ston par byed de/_de bas na de'i 'og tu legs par smra ba bstan to/_/de ltar snying
[\[235b.7\]]rje dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don du rigs par smra ba la zhugs pa de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong zhing sems can gyi don mi gtong zhing mi ldog ste/_de bas na de'i 'og tu brtan pa bstan to/_/de ltar brtan pa de dag ldan pa de sems can bstan pa
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]la ma zhugs ba rnams ni bstan pa la gzung ba'i phyir zang zing gis phan 'dogs par byed do/_/bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams la ni chos bshad pas phan 'dogs par byed de/_de bas na de'i 'og tu lag pa brkyang ba dang /_dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba bstan
[\[236a.2\]]to/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdus te/_de la pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis mtshan ma gang bsdus she na/_snying rje ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus so/_/legs par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[236a.3\]]pas bsdus te/_de la sems can rnams la 'phral du tshig rtsub po mi smra zhing snyan par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus so/_/dam pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus so/_/de la brtan pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[236a.4\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus so/_/lag pa brkyang ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus so/_/dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus
[\[236a.5\]]so/_/mtshan ma lnga po de dag gi las bstan pa'i phyir/_yongs su sdud dang mos pa 'thob/_/skyo med gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_snying rje dang ldan pa'i las ni byang chub kyi sems kyis sems can yongs su bzung ba ste/_snying rje dang ldan na
[\[236a.6\]]skye gnas bzhis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes khas len pa'i phyir ro/_/legs par smra ba ni sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir smra ste/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[236a.7\]]rnams bzhin 'dzum zhing 'phral du snyan par smra ba'i tshig dang /_chos ston pa'i sgo nas sems can drangs te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad pa skyed par byed do/_/brtan pa dang ldan par bya ba ni bdag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]grang ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa'i phyi'i sdug bsngal dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa nang gi sdug bsngal byung bas mi skyo zhing mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/_brtan pa dang ldan par bya ste/_brtan pa dang ldan par gyur na dka' ba spyod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi skyo bar 'gyur
[\[236b.2\]]ro/_/lag pa brkyang ba dang /_dgongs pa zab mo 'grel pa gnyis dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag par bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phan pa lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ste/_sems can gyi phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob na 'dod chags
[\[236b.3\]]la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gtse ba med pas phan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god do snyam du bsam pa ni bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ste/_sems can gyi phung po'i
[\[236b.4\]]lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob na/_skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa lnga las mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'dod pa ni phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa yin pas/_
[\[236b.5\]]de ni phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i nang du bsdus te/_de yan chad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa gnyis bstan to/_/de ltar bsam pa de lta bu ni brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[236b.6\]]bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ste/_'dis ni sems can gyi don du lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dbye ba bstan to/_/ma dag pa dang zhes bya ba la mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ma dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes
[\[236b.7\]]bya ste/_chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa ma spangs pas na ma dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba la/_sa dang po yan chad sa bdun pa
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]man chad la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa la rnam par dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ste/_sa de dag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par spangs shing gzung ba dang 'dzin
[\[237a.2\]]pa la mngon par chags pa yang med la/_bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa yang shas kyis spangs pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba la/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa/_sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa la gnas pa'i
[\[237a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsam pa la shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na sa bdun pa yan chad na ni brtsal 'bad dang bcas pas rtsol ba dang 'bad pa'i mtshan nyid du ldog pa yod mod kyi sa brgyad pa yan chad thob nas ni brtsal 'bad pa thams cad spangs te/_
[\[237a.4\]]lhun gyis grub pas brtsal 'bad kyi mtshan nyid du phyir ldog pa med pas na shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ste/_tshig de dag gis bdag gi dbang du byas nas/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dbye ba bstan to/_/sa kun la zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa bcu'i
[\[237a.5\]]steng du mos pa spyod pa'i sa bsnan te sa bcu gcig po de dag kun na lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa lnga zhig 'byung ste/_sems can gyi dbang du byas nas ni/_phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa gnyis 'byung ngo /_/bdag gi dbang du
[\[237a.6\]]byas nas ni/_ma dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_shin tu dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo /_/yongs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa zhes
[\[237a.7\]]bya ba la/_de ltar sems can gyi don dang bdag gi don bya'o snyam du sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nyan thos bzhin du 'khor ba la zhe sdang ba ma yin gyi/_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams sdud cing mi gtong bar byed de/_de bas na lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rjes la/_yongs su bsdu ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan to/_/smon lam dang ni sems mnyam pa/_/bdag po byed pas yongs su bsdus/_/tshogs rnam drang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/blo ldan rnams kyis sa kun la/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub sems
[\[237b.2\]]dpa' rnams kyis sems can yongs su sdud pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_smon lam gyis yongs su sdud pa dang /_sems mnyam pa 'thob pas yongs su sdud pa dang /_bdag po byed pas yongs su sdud pa dang /_tshogs rnam par 'dren pas yongs su sdud pa ste/_blo ldan byang chub
[\[237b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams mos pa spyod pa'i sa yan chad sa bcu gcig po kun la/_rnam pa bzhi lta bus sems can yongs su sdud par byed do/_/de la smon lam gyis yongs su sdud pa ni dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis
[\[237b.4\]]sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o zhes khas len pa ni smon lam gyis yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ste/_de'ang dper na 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i mdo las/_ji snyed du sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa mngal nas skyes pa dang /_sgo nga
[\[237b.5\]]las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes yod pa dang /_'du shes med pa la sogs pa sems can gyi grangs su 'gro bar bgrang ba'i rnams/_phung po lhag ma ma lus par spangs pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o
[\[237b.6\]]zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/sems mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can yongs su sdud pa ni sa dang po la chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i dus na/_bdag dang pha rol mi 'byed pa'i sems thob pas/_sems can rnams mi gtong zhing sdud par byed pa ste/_
[\[237b.7\]]de'ang sa bcu'i sa dang po'i mdo las/_'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bas/_bdag la phangs par sems pa yang med na/_yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems pa lta ga la yod de/_de ni su las kyang rim gro bya ba cung zad tsam yang re ba med la gzhan du na
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bdag nyid kyis sems can de dag la yo byad mang po thams cad kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/bdag po byed pas sems can yongs su sdud pa ni gang gi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'am/_
[\[238a.2\]]blon po'am/_rje bo'am dpon po la sogs pa dbang dang ldan par gyur na/_mthu dang dbang gis sems can mi dge ba las zlog cing dge ba la 'jog par byed pa ste/_de'ang dper na sa bcu ba'i sa dang po las de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher 'dzam
[\[238a.3\]]bu'i gling du rgyal por 'gyur te/_srid chen po la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob cing chos kyis yongs su bskyang ba dang /_sems can rnams sbyin pa chen pos yongs su bsdus pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/_sems can rnams kyi 'jungs pa'i dri ma bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin zhes
[\[238a.4\]]bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so/_/sa gnyis pa las kyang /_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams phal cher 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gling bzhi pa la dbang bar 'gyur te/_chos kyis dbang bsgyur ba rab tu 'thob cing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_
[\[238a.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi ser sna'i skyon dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa'i dri ma bzlog pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa dang sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shin tu mkhas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs te/_sa gsum pa
[\[238a.6\]]la sogs pa la yang /_rgyal po dang jo bor gyur nas sems can gyi don byed pa la mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro/_/tshogs rnam par drang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can sdud pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon du gyur nas/_sems can rnams slob mar byas te sems can
[\[238a.7\]]rnams mi dge ba'i gnas nas bzlog cing dge ba'i gnas su dgod par byed do/_/skye ba rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la/_de ltar sems can bsdu ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]la gnas pas sems can sdud par mi nus kyi 'khor bar skyes na gdod sems can sdud par nus te/_de bas na yongs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i 'og tu skye ba rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bshad do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba mdor bsdus na rnam
[\[238b.2\]]ba bzhi ste/_las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba dang /_'byor pa'i dbang gis skye ba'o/_/las rnams kyi ni dbang dag dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dis las kyi dbang gis skye ba bstan te sa dang po la sogs pa la zhugs
[\[238b.3\]]pa mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni las kyi dbang gis skyes te de dag sems la dbang ma thob pas gang du bsams shing smon lam btab pa der gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar nges pa med de/_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi las byas pas bdag dang gzhan
[\[238b.4\]]la phan par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/de ltar skye ba de sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis skye ba ni ma yin par gzhag go/_/gzhan yang smon lam dag gis te zhes bya ba la/_gzhan gyi sgra ni sa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya ste/_sa dang po dang
[\[238b.5\]]gnyis pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lha dang mi dang byol song dang yi dwags dang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/_smon lam gyi dbang gis skye
[\[238b.6\]]ba len te/_lo nyes chen po byung ba'i dus na sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang /_skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal med par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/_nya dang glang po che la sogs pa'i lus blangs nas/_rang gi shas sems can la tshim par byas pa dang /_nad kyi
[\[238b.7\]]bskal pa bar ma byung nas nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa na/_smon lam gyi dbang gis rig sngags grub pa dang /_sman pa chen po'i lus su bsgyur nas/_sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa ste/_rgyas par de bzhin
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i mdo las/_sku'i gsang ba bstan pa'i skabs su ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro/_/ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la/_sa gsum pa yan chad sa bdun man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi don du ting nge 'dzin
[\[239a.2\]]gyi dbang gis skye ste/_ting nge 'dzin dang bsam gtan bsgrubs pas ni gzugs kyi khams su skye zhing 'bras bu len pa yin pa las/_de las bzlog nas 'dod pa'i khams su skyes te/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/brtan pa rnams ni skye ba 'dod/_/sa brgyad pa
[\[239a.3\]]dang dgu pa dang bcu pa la sogs pa nas sa bcu pa'i 'byor pa thob pa nas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sprul pa'i sku dga' ldan gyi pho brang na gnas pa dang /_de na 'chi 'pho bstan te/_yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_lhums nas 'byung ba la sogs
[\[239a.4\]]pa ston pa ste/_dbang bcu'i 'byor ba thob pa yang sa bcu pa'i sa brgyad pa las des lus kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu rab tu thob pas/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir che'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin
[\[239a.5\]]shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan cing /_shin tu klubs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/las kyi rnam par
[\[239a.6\]]smin pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du mngon par bstan pa'i phyir/_las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang dus gang du ji dga' bar mngon par 'tshang rgya
[\[239a.7\]]bas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/_/mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
[\[239b.2\]]chos kyi snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar na brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams ni smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba yang yod mod kyi/_phal cher las kyi dbang gis skye'o/_/sa dang po dang
[\[239b.3\]]gnyis pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba yang yod mod kyi phal cher smon lam gyi dbang gis skye'o/_/sa gsum pa yan chad bdun pa man chad ni phal cher ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye'o/_/sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa pha ni
[\[239b.4\]]dbang bcu 'thob pa 'byor pa'i dbang du skye'o/_/gang bsam gtan rnams la bzlog nas zhes bya ba la/_bsam gtan las bzlog pa'i don ji lta bu/_ci bsam gtan yongs su btang ba la bsam gtan las bzlog pa zhes bya ba'am zhe na/_lan du bsam gtan las bzlog pa'i
[\[239b.5\]]don ni bsam gtan yongs su btang ba la mi bya'i/_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu gzugs kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba las 'bras bu de bzlog nas sems can gyi don du 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed pa'o/_/gnas pa'i sa rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya
[\[239b.6\]]ba la/_de ltar 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba rnam pa bzhir bshad pa yang 'gro ba dang skye gnas tha dad pa dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde'i bye brag gis skye ba mtha' yas pas te/_/skye ba de dag gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems dag pa chung ngu dang
[\[239b.7\]]'bring dang chen po la sogs pa'i rnam pas sems dag pa'i bye brag mang du 'byung ste/_de bas na skye ba'i rjes la sems rnam par dag pa dbye ba dus gnas pa'i sa ste sa bcu rnam par dbye ba bstan to/_/de la gnas pa nyid sa yin pas gnas pa'i sa zhes bya ste/_dper na
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]sa'i steng na sems can dang sems can ma yin pa sna tshogs skye zhing gnas pa de bzhin du sems dag pa rab 'bring gi bye brag las kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad skye zhing 'byung bas na/_sems dag pa'i khyad par
[\[240a.2\]]nyid la sa bcu zhes bya bar zad do/_/sa bcu'i rnam par dbye ba yang mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i sgo rnam pa gnyis kyis bshad do/_/de la mdor bstan pa'i phyir/_mtshan nyid gang zag bslab pa dang /_/phung po grub pa mtshan ma dang /_/nges pa'i tshig
[\[240a.3\]]dang 'thob pa'i phyir/_gnas pa'i sa ni de nyid do/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_gnas pa'i sa ste/_sa bcu rnams ni don rnam pa brgyad kyis bshad de/_brgyad gang zhe na mtshan nyid dang /_gang zag dang /_bslab pa dang /_phung po dang /_grub pa dang /_mtshan ma dang /_nges pa'i tshig
[\[240a.4\]]dang /_'thob pa ste/_don rnam pa brgyad po de nyid kyis sa bcu bstan cing bshad pa yin na zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa lnga'o zhes bya ba la/_da 'di man chad zhib tu 'chad de/_dper na sa'i mtshan nyid sra ba dang /_chu'i
[\[240a.5\]]mtshan nyid gsher ba yin pa de bzhin du sa dang po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa nas/_sa bcu pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa phye ste bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa lnga rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/stong pa nyid mchog rtogs pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de las dang po'i mtshan
[\[240a.6\]]nyid ni stong pa nyid mchog rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_stong pa nyid mchog ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'o/_/bdag med pa de gnyis sa dang po thob pa'i dus na rtogs pas na sa dang po ni stong pa nyid mchog rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gzhag go/_/de bas na sa dang po las
[\[240a.7\]]kyang bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu brtan pa zhes gsungs pa dang /_sems kyi stobs dang blo'i stobs kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa zhes gsungs pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin zhes gsungs te/_de'i
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]don kyang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pas bsam pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya'o/_/chos la bdag med par rtogs pas lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/yang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pas sems kyi stobs kyis shin tu
[\[240b.2\]]rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/_/chos la bdag med par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas blo'i stobs kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/_/dus gsum gyi dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du rtogs pas dus gsum mnyam pa
[\[240b.3\]]nyid du rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/las rnams chud mi za bar gnas/_/zhes bya ba las gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid ni las rnams chud mi za bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du gzhag ste/_ji ltar zhe na sa gnyis pa'i tshe/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang las de'i 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug
[\[240b.4\]]bsngal ba la sogs pa las kyi rnam par smin pa yod par gzigs nas/_dus thams cad du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ba' zhig la gnas kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni rmi lam na yang nye bar mi spyod do/_/de bas na sa gnyis pa ni las rnams kyis chud mi za ba'i mtshan nyid du
[\[240b.5\]]gzhag go/_/de bas na sa gnyis pa la yang srog gcod pa las phyir ldog pa yin te/_dbyig pa spangs mtshon cha spangs zhes bya ba nas/_de kun du rtog pa tsam gyis kyang /_sems can gzhan la 'tshe ba mi byed na/_sems can gzhan dag la sems can du 'du shes shing
